sn22.1:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
sn22.1:1.3_0: Atha kho nakulapitā gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.1:1.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho nakulapitā gahapati bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.1:2.1_0: “Ahamasmi, bhante, jiṇṇo vuḍḍho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto āturakāyo abhikkhaṇātaṅko.
sn22.1:2.2_0: Aniccadassāvī kho panāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato manobhāvanīyānañca bhikkhūnaṁ.
sn22.1:3.2_0: Āturo hāyaṁ, gahapati, kāyo aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho.
sn22.1:3.3_0: Yo hi, gahapati, imaṁ kāyaṁ pariharanto muhuttampi ārogyaṁ paṭijāneyya, kimaññatra bālyā?
sn22.1:4.1_0: Atha kho nakulapitā gahapati bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā
sn22.1:4.1_2: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn22.1:4.1_3: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho nakulapitaraṁ gahapatiṁ āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca:
sn22.1:4.4_0: Alattha no ajja bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṁ kathaṁ savanāyā”ti?
sn22.1:5.2_0: Idānāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisitto”ti.
sn22.1:5.3_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, gahapati, bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisitto”ti?
sn22.1:5.5_0: ‘ahamasmi, bhante, jiṇṇo vuḍḍho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto āturakāyo abhikkhaṇātaṅko.
sn22.1:5.6_0: Aniccadassāvī kho panāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato manobhāvanīyānañca bhikkhūnaṁ.
sn22.1:6.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, maṁ, bhante, bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.1:6.3_0: Āturo hāyaṁ, gahapati, kāyo aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho.
sn22.1:6.4_0: Yo hi, gahapati, imaṁ kāyaṁ pariharanto muhuttampi ārogyaṁ paṭijāneyya, kimaññatra bālyā?
sn22.1:6.6_0: āturakāyassa me sato cittaṁ anāturaṁ bhavissatīti.
sn22.1:6.8_0: Evaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya amatena abhisitto”ti.
sn22.1:7.1_0: “Na hi pana taṁ, gahapati, paṭibhāsi bhagavantaṁ uttariṁ paṭipucchituṁ:
sn22.1:7.2_2: kittāvatā ca pana āturakāyo hi kho hoti no ca āturacitto’”ti?
sn22.1:7.3_1: āgaccheyyāma āyasmato sāriputtassa santike etassa bhāsitassa atthamaññātuṁ.
sn22.1:7.4_0: Sādhu vatāyasmantaṁyeva sāriputtaṁ paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho”ti.
sn22.1:8.1_0: “Tena hi, gahapati, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn22.1:8.2_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho nakulapitā gahapati āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosi.
sn22.1:9.1_0: “Kathañca, gahapati, āturakāyo ceva hoti, āturacitto ca?
sn22.1:9.2_1: assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṁ adassāvī
sn22.1:9.3_0: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:9.5_0: Tassa ‘ahaṁ rūpaṁ, mama rūpan’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:10.1_0: Vedanaṁ attato samanupassati, vedanāvantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā vedanaṁ, vedanāya vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:10.3_0: Tassa ‘ahaṁ vedanā, mama vedanā’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, sā vedanā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:11.1_0: Saññaṁ attato samanupassati, saññāvantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā saññaṁ, saññāya vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:11.3_0: Tassa ‘ahaṁ saññā, mama saññā’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, sā saññā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:12.1_0: Saṅkhāre attato samanupassati, saṅkhāravantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā saṅkhāre, saṅkhāresu vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:12.3_0: Tassa ‘ahaṁ saṅkhārā, mama saṅkhārā’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, te saṅkhārā vipariṇamanti aññathā honti.
sn22.1:13.1_0: Viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:13.3_0: Tassa ‘ahaṁ viññāṇaṁ, mama viññāṇan’ti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:13.5_0: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, āturakāyo ceva hoti āturacitto ca.
sn22.1:14.1_0: Kathañca, gahapati, āturakāyo hi kho hoti no ca āturacitto?
sn22.1:14.2_1: sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto
sn22.1:14.3_0: na rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā rūpaṁ, na rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.1:14.4_0: ‘Ahaṁ rūpaṁ, mama rūpan’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:14.5_0: Tassa ‘ahaṁ rūpaṁ, mama rūpan’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:15.2_0: ‘Ahaṁ vedanā, mama vedanā’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:15.3_0: Tassa ‘ahaṁ vedanā, mama vedanā’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, sā vedanā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:16.2_0: ‘Ahaṁ saññā, mama saññā’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:16.3_0: Tassa ‘ahaṁ saññā, mama saññā’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, sā saññā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:17.2_0: ‘Ahaṁ saṅkhārā, mama saṅkhārā’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:17.3_0: Tassa ‘ahaṁ saṅkhārā, mama saṅkhārā’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, te saṅkhārā vipariṇamanti aññathā honti.
sn22.1:18.2_0: ‘Ahaṁ viññāṇaṁ, mama viññāṇan’ti na pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti.
sn22.1:18.3_0: Tassa ‘ahaṁ viññāṇaṁ, mama viññāṇan’ti apariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino, taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.1:18.5_0: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, āturakāyo hoti no ca āturacitto”ti.
sn22.1:19.2_0: Attamano nakulapitā gahapati āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
sn22.2:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati devadahaṁ nāma sakyānaṁ nigamo.
sn22.2:1.3_0: Atha kho sambahulā pacchābhūmagamikā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn22.2:1.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.2:1.4_0: “icchāma mayaṁ, bhante, pacchābhūmaṁ janapadaṁ gantuṁ, pacchābhūme janapade nivāsaṁ kappetun”ti.
sn22.2:2.2_0: “Na kho no, bhante, apalokito āyasmā sāriputto”ti.
sn22.2:2.4_0: Sāriputto, bhikkhave, paṇḍito, bhikkhūnaṁ anuggāhako sabrahmacārīnan”ti.
sn22.2:2.5_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn22.2:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato avidūre aññatarasmiṁ eḷagalāgumbe nisinno hoti.
sn22.2:3.2_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ
sn22.2:3.3_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
sn22.2:3.3_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.2:4.4_1: kacci vo āyasmantānaṁ dhammā sussutā suggahitā sumanasikatā sūpadhāritā suppaṭividdhā paññāya,
sn22.2:4.4_2: yathā byākaramānā āyasmanto vuttavādino ceva bhagavato assatha,
sn22.2:4.4_5: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgaccheyyā”ti?
sn22.2:5.1_1: āgaccheyyāma āyasmato sāriputtassa santike etassa bhāsitassa atthamaññātuṁ.
sn22.2:5.2_0: Sādhu vatāyasmantaṁyeva sāriputtaṁ paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho”ti.
sn22.2:5.3_0: “Tena hāvuso, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn22.2:5.4_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
sn22.2:6.5_0: Evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe, āvuso, evaṁ byākareyyātha:
sn22.2:7.1_0: Evaṁ byākatepi kho, āvuso, assuyeva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchitāro—
sn22.2:7.5_0: Evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe, āvuso, evaṁ byākareyyātha:
sn22.2:8.1_0: Evaṁ byākatepi kho, āvuso, assuyeva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchitāro—
sn22.2:8.4_0: ‘kiṁ panāyasmantānaṁ ādīnavaṁ disvā rūpe chandarāgavinayakkhāyī satthā,
sn22.2:8.9_0: Evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe, āvuso, evaṁ byākareyyātha:
sn22.2:8.10_1: avigatarāgassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipāsassa avigatapariḷāhassa avigatataṇhassa tassa
sn22.2:8.14_0: avigatataṇhassa tesaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā.
sn22.2:8.15_0: Viññāṇe avigatarāgassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipāsassa avigatapariḷāhassa avigatataṇhassa
sn22.2:8.16_0: Idaṁ kho no, āvuso, ādīnavaṁ disvā rūpe chandarāgavinayakkhāyī satthā,
sn22.2:9.1_0: Evaṁ byākatepi kho, āvuso, assuyeva uttariṁ pañhaṁ pucchitāro—
sn22.2:9.4_0: ‘kiṁ panāyasmantānaṁ ānisaṁsaṁ disvā rūpe chandarāgavinayakkhāyī satthā,
sn22.2:9.9_0: Evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe, āvuso, evaṁ byākareyyātha:
sn22.2:9.10_1: vigatarāgassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipāsassa vigatapariḷāhassa vigatataṇhassa tassa rūpassa
sn22.2:9.13_0: saṅkhāresu vigatarāgassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipāsassa vigatapariḷāhassa vigatataṇhassa
sn22.2:9.14_0: Viññāṇe vigatarāgassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipāsassa vigatapariḷāhassa vigatataṇhassa
sn22.2:9.15_0: Idaṁ kho no, āvuso, ānisaṁsaṁ disvā rūpe chandarāgavinayakkhāyī satthā, vedanāya …
sn22.2:10.1_1: dhamme upasampajja viharato diṭṭhe ceva dhamme sukho vihāro abhavissa avighāto anupāyāso apariḷāho,
sn22.2:10.1_2: kāyassa ca bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā,
sn22.2:10.1_3: nayidaṁ bhagavā akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānaṁ vaṇṇeyya.
sn22.2:10.2_1: akusale dhamme upasampajja viharato diṭṭhe ceva dhamme dukkho vihāro savighāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho,
sn22.2:10.2_2: kāyassa ca bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā,
sn22.2:10.2_3: tasmā bhagavā akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānaṁ vaṇṇeti.
sn22.2:11.1_1: dhamme upasampajja viharato diṭṭhe ceva dhamme dukkho vihāro abhavissa savighāto saupāyāso sapariḷāho,
sn22.2:11.1_2: kāyassa ca bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā,
sn22.2:11.1_3: nayidaṁ bhagavā kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadaṁ vaṇṇeyya.
sn22.2:11.2_1: kusale dhamme upasampajja viharato diṭṭhe ceva dhamme sukho vihāro avighāto anupāyāso apariḷāho,
sn22.2:11.2_2: kāyassa ca bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā,
sn22.2:11.2_3: tasmā bhagavā kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadaṁ vaṇṇetī”ti.
sn22.2:12.2_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
sn22.3:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā mahākaccāno avantīsu viharati kuraraghare papāte pabbate.
sn22.3:1.3_0: Atha kho hāliddikāni gahapati yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.3:1.3_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn22.3:1.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho hāliddikāni gahapati āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.3:3.1_0: Imassa nu kho, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa kathaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?
sn22.3:5.2_1: yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā te tathāgatassa pahīnā
sn22.3:5.7_1: yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā te tathāgatassa pahīnā
sn22.3:7.2_1: tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.3:7.8_1: tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.3:8.2_1: ekacco gihīhi saṁsaṭṭho viharati sahanandī sahasokī,
sn22.3:8.2_4: uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā tesu yogaṁ āpajjati.
sn22.3:8.3_0: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, gāme santhavajāto hoti.
sn22.3:9.1_0: Kathañca, gahapati, gāme na santhavajāto hoti?
sn22.3:9.2_1: bhikkhu gihīhi asaṁsaṭṭho viharati na sahanandī na sahasokī na sukhitesu sukhito na dukkhitesu dukkhito,
sn22.3:9.2_2: uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu na attanā tesu yogaṁ āpajjati.
sn22.3:9.3_0: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, gāme na santhavajāto hoti.
sn22.3:10.2_1: ekacco kāmesu avigatarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
sn22.3:10.3_0: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, kāmehi aritto hoti.
sn22.3:11.2_1: ekacco kāmesu vigatarāgo hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipāso vigatapariḷāho vigatataṇho.
sn22.3:11.3_0: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, kāmehi ritto hoti.
sn22.3:13.2_0: Idha, gahapati, ekaccassa na evaṁ hoti:
sn22.3:14.1_0: Kathañca, gahapati, kathaṁ viggayha janena kattā hoti?
sn22.3:14.2_0: Idha, gahapati, ekacco evarūpiṁ kathaṁ kattā hoti:
sn22.3:14.4_0: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, kathaṁ viggayha janena kattā hoti.
sn22.3:15.1_0: Kathañca, gahapati, kathaṁ na viggayha janena kattā hoti?
sn22.3:15.2_0: Idha, gahapati, bhikkhu na evarūpiṁ kathaṁ kattā hoti:
sn22.3:15.3_0: ‘na tvaṁ imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ ājānāsi …pe… nibbeṭhehi vā sace pahosī’ti.
sn22.3:15.4_0: Evaṁ kho, gahapati, kathaṁ na viggayha janena kattā hoti.
sn22.3:16.1_0: Iti kho, gahapati, yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā aṭṭhakavaggiye māgaṇḍiyapañhe:
sn22.3:18.1_0: Imassa kho, gahapati, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
sn22.4:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā mahākaccāno avantīsu viharati kuraraghare papāte pabbate.
sn22.4:1.3_0: Atha kho hāliddikāni gahapati yenāyasmā mahākaccāno …pe…
sn22.4:1.3_1: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho hāliddikāni gahapati āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.4:1.5_1: te accantaniṭṭhā accantayogakkhemino accantabrahmacārino accantapariyosānā seṭṭhā devamanussānan’ti.
sn22.4:2.1_0: Imassa nu kho, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa kathaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?
sn22.4:3.1_1: yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā,
sn22.4:3.1_2: tesaṁ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā ‘cittaṁ suvimuttanti’ vuccati.
sn22.4:4.4_1: yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā,
sn22.4:4.4_2: tesaṁ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā ‘cittaṁ suvimuttanti’ vuccati.
sn22.4:5.1_0: Iti kho, gahapati, yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā sakkapañhe:
sn22.4:5.2_0: ‘ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttā te accantaniṭṭhā accantayogakkhemino accantabrahmacārino accantapariyosānā seṭṭhā devamanussānan’ti.
sn22.4:6.1_0: Imassa kho, gahapati, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
sn22.5:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn22.5:3.3_0: Tassa rūpaṁ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn22.5:4.5_0: Tassa viññāṇaṁ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn22.5:6.1_0: Ko ca, bhikkhave, rūpassa atthaṅgamo, ko vedanāya …
sn22.5:7.1_0: Idha, bhikkhave, nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn22.5:8.3_0: Tassa rūpaṁ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā rūpe nandī sā nirujjhati.
sn22.5:9.2_0: Tassa vedanaṁ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā vedanāya nandī sā nirujjhati.
sn22.5:10.3_0: Tassa saṅkhāre anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā saṅkhāresu nandī sā nirujjhati.
sn22.5:11.2_0: Tassa viññāṇaṁ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā viññāṇe nandī sā nirujjhati.
sn22.7:1.3_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn22.7:1.4_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti, kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn22.7:2.2_2: assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto,
sn22.7:2.2_3: sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
sn22.7:2.3_0: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.7:2.4_0: Tassa taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.7:2.6_0: Tassa rūpavipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:2.7_0: Cetaso pariyādānā uttāsavā ca hoti vighātavā ca apekkhavā ca upādāya ca paritassati.
sn22.7:3.1_0: Vedanaṁ attato samanupassati, vedanāvantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā vedanaṁ, vedanāya vā attānaṁ.
sn22.7:3.2_0: Tassa sā vedanā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.7:3.4_0: Tassa vedanāvipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:3.5_0: Cetaso pariyādānā uttāsavā ca hoti vighātavā ca apekkhavā ca upādāya ca paritassati.
sn22.7:4.2_0: saṅkhāre attato samanupassati, saṅkhāravantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā saṅkhāre, saṅkhāresu vā attānaṁ.
sn22.7:4.3_0: Tassa te saṅkhārā vipariṇamanti aññathā honti.
sn22.7:4.5_0: Tassa saṅkhāravipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:4.6_0: Cetaso pariyādānā uttāsavā ca hoti vighātavā ca apekkhavā ca upādāya ca paritassati.
sn22.7:5.1_0: Viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.7:5.2_0: Tassa taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.7:5.4_0: Tassa viññāṇavipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:5.5_0: Cetaso pariyādānā uttāsavā ca hoti vighātavā ca apekkhavā ca upādāya ca paritassati.
sn22.7:6.2_2: sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto,
sn22.7:6.2_3: sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto
sn22.7:6.3_0: na rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā rūpaṁ, na rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.7:6.4_0: Tassa taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.7:6.5_0: Tassa rūpavipariṇāmaññathābhāvā na rūpavipariṇāmānuparivatti viññāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.7:6.6_0: Tassa na rūpavipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:6.7_0: Cetaso apariyādānā na cevuttāsavā hoti na ca vighātavā na ca apekkhavā, anupādāya ca na paritassati.
sn22.7:7.2_0: Tassa sā vedanā vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.7:7.3_0: Tassa vedanāvipariṇāmaññathābhāvā na vedanāvipariṇāmānuparivatti viññāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.7:7.4_0: Tassa na vedanāvipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:7.5_0: Cetaso apariyādānā na cevuttāsavā hoti na ca vighātavā na ca apekkhavā, anupādāya ca na paritassati.
sn22.7:8.1_0: Na saññaṁ …pe… na saṅkhāre attato samanupassati,
sn22.7:8.2_0: na attani vā saṅkhāre, na saṅkhāresu vā attānaṁ.
sn22.7:8.4_0: Tassa te saṅkhārā vipariṇamanti aññathā honti.
sn22.7:8.5_0: Tassa saṅkhāravipariṇāmaññathābhāvā na saṅkhāravipariṇāmānuparivatti viññāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.7:8.6_0: Tassa na saṅkhāravipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:8.7_0: Cetaso apariyādānā na cevuttāsavā hoti na ca vighātavā na ca apekkhavā, anupādāya ca na paritassati.
sn22.7:9.1_0: Na viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, na viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ …pe…
sn22.7:9.2_0: tassa taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.7:9.3_0: Tassa viññāṇavipariṇāmaññathābhāvā na viññāṇavipariṇāmānuparivatti viññāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.7:9.4_0: Tassa na viññāṇavipariṇāmānuparivattijā paritassanā dhammasamuppādā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn22.7:9.5_0: Cetaso apariyādānā na cevuttāsavā hoti na ca vighātavā na ca apekkhavā, anupādāya ca na paritassati.
sn22.7:9.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, anupādā aparitassanaṁ hotī”ti.
sn22.8:1.5_0: Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano rūpaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:1.6_0: Tassa taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.8:1.11_0: viññāṇaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:1.12_0: Tassa taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.8:2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:2.3_0: Tassa taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.8:2.8_0: viññāṇaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:2.9_0: Tassa taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
sn22.9:1.4_0: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṁ rūpasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.9:1.6_0: paccuppannassa rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.9:1.11_0: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītesu saṅkhāresu anapekkho hoti;
sn22.9:1.13_0: paccuppannānaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.9:1.16_0: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṁ viññāṇasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.9:1.18_0: paccuppannassa viññāṇassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti.
sn22.10:1.4_0: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṁ rūpasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.10:1.6_0: paccuppannassa rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.10:1.12_0: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṁ viññāṇasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.10:1.14_0: paccuppannassa viññāṇassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti.
sn22.11:1.4_0: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṁ rūpasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.11:1.6_0: paccuppannassa rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.11:1.12_0: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṁ viññāṇasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.11:1.14_0: paccuppannassa viññāṇassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti.
sn22.12:1.4_0: “rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ, vedanā aniccā, saññā aniccā, saṅkhārā aniccā, viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ.
sn22.12:1.6_0: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.12:1.7_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.13:1.2_0: “Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ, vedanā dukkhā, saññā dukkhā, saṅkhārā dukkhā, viññāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ.
sn22.14:1.2_0: “Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, anattā, vedanā anattā, saññā anattā, saṅkhārā anattā, viññāṇaṁ anattā.
sn22.14:1.4_0: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.14:1.5_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.15:1.5_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.15:1.9_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.15:1.15_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.16:1.4_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.16:1.10_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.17:1.3_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.17:1.8_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.18:1.3_0: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo rūpassa uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:1.4_0: Aniccasambhūtaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ kuto niccaṁ bhavissati.
sn22.18:1.6_0: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo vedanāya uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:1.7_0: Aniccasambhūtā, bhikkhave, vedanā kuto niccā bhavissati.
sn22.18:1.10_0: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo saṅkhārānaṁ uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:1.11_0: Aniccasambhūtā, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā kuto niccā bhavissanti.
sn22.18:1.13_0: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo viññāṇassa uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:1.14_0: Aniccasambhūtaṁ, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ kuto niccaṁ bhavissati.
sn22.19:1.3_0: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo rūpassa uppādāya, sopi dukkho.
sn22.19:1.4_0: Dukkhasambhūtaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ kuto sukhaṁ bhavissati.
sn22.19:1.9_0: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo viññāṇassa uppādāya, sopi dukkho.
sn22.19:1.10_0: Dukkhasambhūtaṁ, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ kuto sukhaṁ bhavissati.
sn22.20:1.3_0: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo rūpassa uppādāya, sopi anattā.
sn22.20:1.4_0: Anattasambhūtaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ kuto attā bhavissati.
sn22.20:1.9_0: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo viññāṇassa uppādāya, sopi anattā.
sn22.20:1.10_0: Anattasambhūtaṁ, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ kuto attā bhavissati.
sn22.21:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.21:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.21:1.4_0: Katamesānaṁ kho, bhante, dhammānaṁ nirodho ‘nirodho’ti vuccatī”ti?
sn22.21:1.5_1: aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhammaṁ.
sn22.21:1.7_0: Vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā.
sn22.21:1.10_0: saṅkhārā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā.
sn22.21:1.12_0: Viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhammaṁ.
sn22.21:1.14_0: Imesaṁ kho, ānanda, dhammānaṁ nirodho ‘nirodho’ti vuccatī”ti.
sn22.22:1.2_0: “bhārañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi bhārahārañca bhārādānañca bhāranikkhepanañca.
sn22.22:3.2_0: Yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.22:4.2_0: Yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo.
sn22.22:5.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn22.24:1.2_0: “Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṁ aparijānaṁ avirājayaṁ appajahaṁ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya;
sn22.24:1.3_0: vedanaṁ anabhijānaṁ aparijānaṁ avirājayaṁ appajahaṁ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya;
sn22.24:1.5_0: saṅkhāre anabhijānaṁ aparijānaṁ avirājayaṁ appajahaṁ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya;
sn22.24:1.6_0: viññāṇaṁ anabhijānaṁ aparijānaṁ avirājayaṁ appajahaṁ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn22.24:1.7_0: Rūpañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṁ parijānaṁ virājayaṁ pajahaṁ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya;
sn22.24:1.11_0: viññāṇaṁ abhijānaṁ parijānaṁ virājayaṁ pajahaṁ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
sn22.25:1.3_0: Evaṁ taṁ rūpaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ.
sn22.25:1.5_0: Evaṁ sā vedanā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.25:1.7_0: Evaṁ sā saññā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.25:1.9_0: Evaṁ te saṅkhārā pahīnā bhavissanti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.25:1.11_0: Evaṁ taṁ viññāṇaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhamman”ti.
sn22.26:1.2_0: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn22.26:1.3_0: ‘ko nu kho rūpassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ?
sn22.26:1.4_0: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ?
sn22.26:1.5_0: Ko saññāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ?
sn22.26:1.6_0: Ko saṅkhārānaṁ assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ?
sn22.26:1.7_0: Ko viññāṇassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇan’ti?
sn22.26:1.9_0: ‘yaṁ kho rūpaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ rūpassa assādo.
sn22.26:1.10_0: Yaṁ rūpaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, ayaṁ rūpassa ādīnavo.
sn22.26:1.11_0: Yo rūpasmiṁ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ rūpassa nissaraṇaṁ.
sn22.26:1.12_0: Yaṁ vedanaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ vedanāya assādo.
sn22.26:1.13_0: Yaṁ vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṁ vedanāya ādīnavo.
sn22.26:1.14_0: Yo vedanāya chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ vedanāya nissaraṇaṁ.
sn22.26:1.16_0: yaṁ saṅkhāre paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ assādo.
sn22.26:1.17_0: Yaṁ saṅkhārā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ ādīnavo.
sn22.26:1.18_0: Yo saṅkhāresu chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ.
sn22.26:1.19_0: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ viññāṇassa assādo.
sn22.26:1.20_0: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, ayaṁ viññāṇassa ādīnavo.
sn22.26:1.21_0: Yo viññāṇasmiṁ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ viññāṇassa nissaraṇaṁ’.
sn22.26:2.1_2: imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ evaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nābbhaññāsiṁ,
sn22.26:2.1_5: ‘sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṁ.
sn22.26:2.2_2: imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ evaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ;
sn22.26:2.3_2: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsiṁ.
sn22.26:2.5_0: ‘akuppā me vimutti; ayamantimā jāti; natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
sn22.27:1.4_0: Yāvatā rūpassa assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn22.27:1.7_0: Yāvatā rūpassa ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn22.27:1.10_0: Yāvatā rūpassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāya me taṁ sudiṭṭhaṁ.
sn22.27:1.16_0: Yāvatā viññāṇassa assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn22.27:1.19_0: Yāvatā viññāṇassa ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn22.27:1.22_0: Yāvatā viññāṇassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāya me taṁ sudiṭṭhaṁ.
sn22.27:1.23_2: imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ nābbhaññāsiṁ …pe…
sn22.27:1.26_0: ‘akuppā me vimutti; ayamantimā jāti; natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
sn22.28:1.2_0: “No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, rūpassa assādo abhavissa nayidaṁ sattā rūpasmiṁ sārajjeyyuṁ.

sn22.28:2.2_2: sattā sadevakā lokā samārakā sabrahmakā sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya nissaṭā visaṁyuttā vippamuttā vimariyādīkatena cetasā vihariṁsu.

sn22.33:1.3_0: Taṁ vo pahīnaṁ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.

sn22.35:1.2_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.35:1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.35:1.3_0: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desetu;
sn22.35:1.4_0: yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho, appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.35:1.5_0: “Yaṁ kho, bhikkhu, anuseti, tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati;
sn22.35:1.6_0: yaṁ nānuseti, na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchatī”ti.
sn22.35:2.1_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.35:2.5_0: Saṅkhāre ce anuseti tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:2.7_0: Rūpañce, bhante, nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:2.11_0: viññāṇañce nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:2.12_0: Imassa khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.35:3.2_0: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsi.
sn22.35:3.3_0: Rūpañce, bhikkhu, anuseti tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:3.8_0: Rūpañce, bhikkhu, nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:3.12_0: viññāṇañce nānuseti na tena saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
sn22.35:3.13_0: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena, bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
sn22.35:4.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
sn22.35:5.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti,
sn22.35:5.1_1: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn22.35:5.2_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn22.35:5.3_0: Aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosīti.

sn22.42:1.3_11: parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
sn22.43:1.2_0: “Attadīpā, bhikkhave, viharatha attasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā, dhammadīpā dhammasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā.
sn22.43:1.3_3: dhammadīpānaṁ dhammasaraṇānaṁ anaññasaraṇānaṁ yoni upaparikkhitabbā ‘Kiṁjātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā,
sn22.43:2.2_2: assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto,
sn22.43:2.2_3: sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto,
sn22.43:2.3_0: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.43:2.4_0: Tassa taṁ rūpaṁ vipariṇamati, aññathā ca hoti.
sn22.43:2.6_0: Vedanaṁ attato samanupassati, vedanāvantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā vedanaṁ, vedanāya vā attānaṁ.
sn22.43:2.7_0: Tassa sā vedanā vipariṇamati, aññathā ca hoti.
sn22.43:2.11_0: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.43:2.12_0: Tassa taṁ viññāṇaṁ vipariṇamati, aññathā ca hoti.
sn22.43:3.1_3: ‘pubbe ceva rūpaṁ etarahi ca sabbaṁ rūpaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhamman’ti,
sn22.43:3.1_4: evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato ye sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā te pahīyanti.
sn22.43:3.3_3: ‘pubbe ceva vedanā etarahi ca sabbā vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā’ti,
sn22.43:3.3_4: evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato ye sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā te pahīyanti.
sn22.43:3.6_3: ‘pubbe ceva saṅkhārā etarahi ca sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā’ti,
sn22.43:3.6_4: evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato ye sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā te pahīyanti.
sn22.43:3.8_3: ‘pubbe ceva viññāṇaṁ etarahi ca sabbaṁ viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhamman’ti,
sn22.43:3.8_4: evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato ye sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā te pahīyanti.
sn22.44:1.2_0: “Sakkāyasamudayagāminiñca vo, bhikkhave, paṭipadaṁ desessāmi, sakkāyanirodhagāminiñca paṭipadaṁ.
sn22.44:1.5_2: assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto,
sn22.44:1.5_3: sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto,
sn22.44:1.6_0: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.44:1.10_0: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.44:1.11_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘sakkāyasamudayagāminī paṭipadā, sakkāyasamudayagāminī paṭipadā’ti.
sn22.44:2.2_2: sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto,
sn22.44:2.2_3: sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto,
sn22.44:2.3_0: na rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā rūpaṁ, na rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.44:2.8_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘sakkāyanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, sakkāyanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti.
sn22.45:1.5_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.45:1.6_0: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato cittaṁ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
sn22.45:1.13_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.45:1.14_0: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato cittaṁ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
sn22.45:1.15_2: bhikkhuno cittaṁ virattaṁ vimuttaṁ hoti anupādāya āsavehi,
sn22.45:1.18_0: viññāṇadhātuyā ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cittaṁ virattaṁ vimuttaṁ hoti anupādāya āsavehi.
sn22.45:1.20_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.46:1.5_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.46:1.12_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.46:2.1_0: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato pubbantānudiṭṭhiyo na honti.
sn22.46:2.3_0: Aparantānudiṭṭhīnaṁ asati, thāmaso parāmāso na hoti.
sn22.46:2.8_0: viññāṇasmiṁ cittaṁ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
sn22.46:2.10_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.47:1.2_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṁ attānaṁ samanupassamānā samanupassanti,
sn22.47:1.4_2: assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto,
sn22.47:1.4_3: sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
sn22.47:1.5_0: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.47:1.9_0: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.47:2.1_0: Iti ayañceva samanupassanā ‘asmī’ti cassa avigataṁ hoti.
sn22.47:2.2_0: ‘Asmī’ti kho pana, bhikkhave, avigate pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ avakkanti hoti—
sn22.47:2.4_0: Atthi, bhikkhave, mano, atthi dhammā, atthi avijjādhātu.
sn22.47:2.5_0: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa ‘asmī’tipissa hoti;
sn22.47:3.2_0: Athettha sutavato ariyasāvakassa avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati.
sn22.48:1.5_2: rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.48:1.8_0: ye keci saṅkhārā atītānāgatapaccuppannā ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikā vā sukhumā vā …pe…
sn22.48:1.9_0: Yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.48:2.2_3: yaṁ dūre santike vā sāsavaṁ upādāniyaṁ,
sn22.48:2.3_0: Yā kāci vedanā …pe… yā dūre santike vā sāsavā upādāniyā, ayaṁ vuccati vedanupādānakkhandho.
sn22.48:2.4_0: Yā kāci saññā …pe… yā dūre santike vā sāsavā upādāniyā, ayaṁ vuccati saññupādānakkhandho.
sn22.48:2.5_0: Ye keci saṅkhārā …pe… sāsavā upādāniyā, ayaṁ vuccati saṅkhārupādānakkhandho.
sn22.48:2.6_1: yaṁ dūre santike vā sāsavaṁ upādāniyaṁ,
sn22.49:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn22.49:1.3_0: Atha kho soṇo gahapatiputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn22.49:1.4_0: ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho soṇaṁ gahapatiputtaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.49:2.1_1: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā aniccena rūpena dukkhena vipariṇāmadhammena ‘seyyohamasmī’ti vā samanupassanti;
sn22.49:2.5_0: Aniccāya vedanāya dukkhāya vipariṇāmadhammāya ‘seyyohamasmī’ti vā samanupassanti;
sn22.49:2.10_0: aniccehi saṅkhārehi dukkhehi vipariṇāmadhammehi ‘seyyohamasmī’ti vā samanupassanti;
sn22.49:2.14_0: Aniccena viññāṇena dukkhena vipariṇāmadhammena ‘seyyohamasmī’ti vā samanupassanti;
sn22.49:3.1_1: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā aniccena rūpena dukkhena vipariṇāmadhammena ‘seyyohamasmī’tipi na samanupassanti;
sn22.49:3.8_0: aniccena viññāṇena dukkhena vipariṇāmadhammena ‘seyyohamasmī’tipi na samanupassanti;
sn22.49:4.4_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.49:4.6_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.49:4.15_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.49:4.17_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.49:5.1_1: yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.49:5.1_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.49:6.4_0: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.49:6.4_3: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.49:7.2_0: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.49:7.3_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.50:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn22.50:1.3_0: Atha kho soṇo gahapatiputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.50:1.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho soṇaṁ gahapatiputtaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.50:2.1_1: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā rūpaṁ nappajānanti,
sn22.50:2.6_1: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā,
sn22.50:2.6_2: na ca pana te āyasmanto sāmaññatthaṁ vā brahmaññatthaṁ vā diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti.
sn22.50:3.1_1: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā rūpaṁ pajānanti,
sn22.50:3.6_1: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca brāhmaṇasammatā,
sn22.50:3.6_2: te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
sn22.51:1.2_0: “Aniccaññeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rūpaṁ aniccanti passati. Sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi.
sn22.51:1.6_0: Aniccaññeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedanaṁ aniccanti passati. Sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi.
sn22.51:1.10_0: Aniccaññeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saññaṁ aniccanti passati …pe…
sn22.51:1.11_0: anicceyeva bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṅkhāre aniccāti passati. Sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi.
sn22.51:1.15_0: Aniccaññeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu viññāṇaṁ aniccanti passati. Sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi.
sn22.52:1.2_0: “Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, rūpāniccatañca yathābhūtaṁ samanupassatha.
sn22.52:1.6_0: Vedanaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, vedanāniccatañca yathābhūtaṁ samanupassatha.
sn22.52:1.11_0: saṅkhāre, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, saṅkhārāniccatañca yathābhūtaṁ samanupassatha.
sn22.52:1.15_0: Viññāṇaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha, viññāṇāniccatañca yathābhūtaṁ samanupassatha.
sn22.53:1.3_3: rūpārammaṇaṁ rūpappatiṭṭhaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyya.
sn22.53:1.6_3: saṅkhārārammaṇaṁ saṅkhārappatiṭṭhaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyya.
sn22.53:2.2_0: ‘ahamaññatra rūpā aññatra vedanāya aññatra saññāya aññatra saṅkhārehi viññāṇassa āgatiṁ vā gatiṁ vā cutiṁ
sn22.53:2.2_1: vā upapattiṁ vā vuddhiṁ vā virūḷhiṁ vā vepullaṁ vā paññāpessāmī’ti,
sn22.53:3.1_0: Rūpadhātuyā ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rāgo pahīno hoti.
sn22.53:3.2_0: Rāgassa pahānā vocchijjatārammaṇaṁ patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn22.53:3.6_0: viññāṇadhātuyā ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rāgo pahīno hoti.
sn22.53:3.7_0: Rāgassa pahānā vocchijjatārammaṇaṁ patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn22.53:3.10_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.54:1.4_0: Mūlabījaṁ, khandhabījaṁ, aggabījaṁ, phalubījaṁ, bījabījaññeva pañcamaṁ.
sn22.54:1.5_2: pañca bījajātāni akhaṇḍāni apūtikāni avātātapahatāni sārādāni sukhasayitāni,
sn22.54:1.6_0: api numāni, bhikkhave, pañca bījajātāni vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyun”ti?
sn22.54:1.9_0: api numāni, bhikkhave, pañca bījajātāni vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyun”ti?
sn22.54:1.11_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātu, evaṁ catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo daṭṭhabbā.
sn22.54:1.12_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, āpodhātu, evaṁ nandirāgo daṭṭhabbo.
sn22.54:1.13_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pañca bījajātāni, evaṁ viññāṇaṁ sāhāraṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.54:2.1_3: rūpārammaṇaṁ rūpappatiṭṭhaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyya.
sn22.54:2.2_0: Vedanupayaṁ vā, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhamānaṁ tiṭṭheyya …pe…
sn22.54:2.3_0: saññupayaṁ vā, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhamānaṁ tiṭṭheyya …pe…
sn22.54:2.4_3: saṅkhārārammaṇaṁ saṅkhārappatiṭṭhaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyya.
sn22.54:3.2_0: ‘ahamaññatra rūpā aññatra vedanāya aññatra saññāya aññatra saṅkhārehi viññāṇassa āgatiṁ vā gatiṁ vā cutiṁ
sn22.54:3.2_1: vā upapattiṁ vā vuddhiṁ vā virūḷhiṁ vā vepullaṁ vā paññāpessāmī’ti,
sn22.54:4.1_0: Rūpadhātuyā ceva, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rāgo pahīno hoti.
sn22.54:4.2_0: Rāgassa pahānā vocchijjatārammaṇaṁ patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn22.54:4.6_0: viññāṇadhātuyā ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rāgo pahīno hoti.
sn22.54:4.7_0: Rāgassa pahānā vocchijjatārammaṇaṁ patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn22.55:1.3_0: “‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti—
sn22.55:1.4_0: evaṁ adhimuccamāno bhikkhu chindeyya orambhāgiyāni saṁyojanānī”ti.
sn22.55:1.5_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.55:1.6_0: “yathā kathaṁ pana, bhante, ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti—
sn22.55:1.7_0: evaṁ adhimuccamāno bhikkhu chindeyya orambhāgiyāni saṁyojanānī”ti?
sn22.55:2.6_0: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.55:3.1_0: So aniccaṁ rūpaṁ ‘aniccaṁ rūpan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti,
sn22.55:7.1_1: ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto
sn22.55:8.1_0: So aniccaṁ rūpaṁ ‘aniccaṁ rūpan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.55:8.8_0: saṅkhataṁ rūpaṁ …pe… saṅkhataṁ viññāṇaṁ ‘saṅkhataṁ viññāṇan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.55:9.2_0: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti—
sn22.55:9.3_0: evaṁ adhimuccamāno bhikkhu chindeyya orambhāgiyāni saṁyojanānī”ti.
sn22.55:9.4_0: “Evaṁ adhimuccamāno, bhante, bhikkhu chindeyya orambhāgiyāni saṁyojanānī”ti.
sn22.55:10.1_0: “Kathaṁ pana, bhante, jānato kathaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti?
sn22.55:10.2_0: “Idha, bhikkhu, assutavā puthujjano atasitāye ṭhāne tāsaṁ āpajjati.
sn22.55:10.4_0: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.55:11.1_0: Sutavā ca kho, bhikkhu, ariyasāvako atasitāye ṭhāne na tāsaṁ āpajjati.
sn22.55:11.2_0: Na heso, bhikkhu, tāso sutavato ariyasāvakassa:
sn22.55:11.3_0: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.55:11.4_2: rūpārammaṇaṁ rūpappatiṭṭhaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyya.
sn22.55:11.7_2: saṅkhārārammaṇaṁ saṅkhārappatiṭṭhaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyya.
sn22.55:12.2_3: aññatra saṅkhārehi viññāṇassa āgatiṁ vā gatiṁ vā cutiṁ vā upapattiṁ vā vuddhiṁ vā virūḷhiṁ vā vepullaṁ vā paññāpessāmī’ti,
sn22.55:13.1_2: Rāgassa pahānā vocchijjatārammaṇaṁ patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn22.55:13.5_2: Rāgassa pahānā vocchijjatārammaṇaṁ patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn22.55:13.9_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti.
sn22.56:1.5_5: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsiṁ.
sn22.56:1.6_2: ime pañcupādānakkhandhe catuparivaṭṭaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, athāhaṁ,
sn22.56:3.2_0: Cattāro ca mahābhūtā catunnañca mahābhūtānaṁ upādāya rūpaṁ.
sn22.56:3.6_0: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo rūpanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—

sn22.56:4.1_5: evaṁ rūpanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā,

sn22.56:7.2_0: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti.

sn22.56:9.3_0: rūpasaññā, saddasaññā, gandhasaññā, rasasaññā, phoṭṭhabbasaññā, dhammasaññā.

sn22.56:11.1_5: evaṁ saṅkhāranirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya saṅkhārānaṁ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā,
sn22.56:11.2_0: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti.
sn22.56:12.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ saṅkhāre abhiññāya,
sn22.56:12.1_5: evaṁ saṅkhāranirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya saṅkhārānaṁ nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimuttā,

sn22.56:13.3_0: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, sotaviññāṇaṁ, ghānaviññāṇaṁ, jivhāviññāṇaṁ, kāyaviññāṇaṁ, manoviññāṇaṁ.
sn22.56:13.7_0: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo viññāṇanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.56:14.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ viññāṇaṁ abhiññāya,
sn22.56:14.1_5: evaṁ viññāṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya viññāṇassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā,
sn22.56:14.2_0: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti.
sn22.56:15.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ viññāṇaṁ abhiññāya,
sn22.56:15.1_5: evaṁ viññāṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ abhiññāya viññāṇassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimuttā,
sn22.56:15.3_0: Ye kevalino vaṭṭaṁ tesaṁ natthi paññāpanāyā”ti.
sn22.57:1.2_2: bhikkhu tividhūpaparikkhī imasmiṁ dhammavinaye kevalī vusitavā uttamapurisoti vuccati.
sn22.57:1.5_0: rūpassa assādaṁ pajānāti, rūpassa ādīnavaṁ pajānāti, rūpassa nissaraṇaṁ pajānāti;
sn22.57:1.10_0: viññāṇassa assādaṁ pajānāti, viññāṇassa ādīnavaṁ pajānāti, viññāṇassa nissaraṇaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.57:2.2_0: Cattāro ca mahābhūtā, catunnañca mahābhūtānaṁ upādāya rūpaṁ.
sn22.57:2.6_0: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo rūpanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.57:3.1_0: Yaṁ rūpaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—
sn22.57:4.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ rūpaṁ abhiññāya,
sn22.57:4.2_2: evaṁ rūpassa nissaraṇaṁ abhiññāya rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā,
sn22.57:4.3_0: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti.
sn22.57:5.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ rūpaṁ abhiññāya,
sn22.57:5.2_2: evaṁ rūpassa nissaraṇaṁ abhiññāya rūpassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimuttā,
sn22.57:5.4_0: Ye kevalino vaṭṭaṁ tesaṁ natthi paññāpanāya.
sn22.57:6.8_0: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.57:7.1_0: Yaṁ vedanaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—
sn22.57:8.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ vedanaṁ abhiññāya,
sn22.57:8.2_2: evaṁ vedanāya nissaraṇaṁ abhiññāya vedanāya nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā,
sn22.57:8.3_0: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti.
sn22.57:9.1_0: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ vedanaṁ abhiññāya …pe…
sn22.57:10.3_0: rūpasaññā, saddasaññā, gandhasaññā, rasasaññā, phoṭṭhabbasaññā, dhammasaññā.
sn22.57:10.7_0: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saññānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.57:11.8_0: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅkhāranirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.57:12.1_0: Yaṁ saṅkhāre paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—
sn22.57:13.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ saṅkhāre abhiññāya,
sn22.57:13.1_6: saṅkhārānaṁ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā te suppaṭipannā.
sn22.57:13.2_0: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti …pe…
sn22.57:14.3_0: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, sotaviññāṇaṁ, ghānaviññāṇaṁ, jivhāviññāṇaṁ, kāyaviññāṇaṁ, manoviññāṇaṁ.
sn22.57:14.7_0: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo viññāṇanirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.57:15.1_0: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—
sn22.57:16.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ viññāṇaṁ abhiññāya,
sn22.57:16.2_2: evaṁ viññāṇassa nissaraṇaṁ abhiññāya viññāṇassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannā,
sn22.57:16.3_0: Ye suppaṭipannā, te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye gādhanti.
sn22.57:17.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ viññāṇaṁ abhiññāya,
sn22.57:17.2_2: evaṁ viññāṇassa nissaraṇaṁ abhiññāya viññāṇassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimuttā,
sn22.57:17.4_0: Ye kevalino vaṭṭaṁ tesaṁ natthi paññāpanāya.
sn22.57:17.5_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sattaṭṭhānakusalo hoti.
sn22.57:18.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tividhūpaparikkhī hoti.
sn22.58:1.2_2: arahaṁ sammāsambuddho rūpassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto sammāsambuddhoti vuccati.
sn22.58:1.3_2: paññāvimutto rūpassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto paññāvimuttoti vuccati.
sn22.58:2.1_2: arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vedanāya nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto sammāsambuddhoti vuccati.
sn22.58:2.2_0: Bhikkhupi, bhikkhave, paññāvimutto vedanāya nibbidā …pe… paññāvimuttoti vuccati.
sn22.58:3.3_0: viññāṇassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto sammāsambuddhoti vuccati.
sn22.58:3.4_2: paññāvimutto viññāṇassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto paññāvimuttoti vuccati.
sn22.58:4.3_0: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn22.58:4.4_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn22.58:5.2_0: maggānugā ca, bhikkhave, etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā.
sn22.58:5.3_3: idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa paññāvimuttena bhikkhunā”ti.
sn22.59:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ viharati isipatane migadāye.
sn22.59:1.2_0: Tatra kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn22.59:2.2_0: Rūpañca hidaṁ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṁ rūpaṁ ābādhāya saṁvatteyya, labbhetha ca rūpe:
sn22.59:2.3_0: ‘evaṁ me rūpaṁ hotu, evaṁ me rūpaṁ mā ahosī’ti.
sn22.59:2.4_0: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṁ anattā, tasmā rūpaṁ ābādhāya saṁvattati, na ca labbhati rūpe:
sn22.59:2.5_0: ‘evaṁ me rūpaṁ hotu, evaṁ me rūpaṁ mā ahosī’ti.
sn22.59:3.3_0: ‘evaṁ me vedanā hotu, evaṁ me vedanā mā ahosī’ti.
sn22.59:3.4_0: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, vedanā anattā, tasmā vedanā ābādhāya saṁvattati, na ca labbhati vedanāya:
sn22.59:3.5_0: ‘evaṁ me vedanā hotu, evaṁ me vedanā mā ahosī’ti.
sn22.59:4.4_0: ‘evaṁ me saṅkhārā hontu, evaṁ me saṅkhārā mā ahesun’ti.
sn22.59:4.6_0: ‘evaṁ me saṅkhārā hontu, evaṁ me saṅkhārā mā ahesun’ti.
sn22.59:5.3_0: ‘evaṁ me viññāṇaṁ hotu, evaṁ me viññāṇaṁ mā ahosī’ti.
sn22.59:5.5_0: ‘evaṁ me viññāṇaṁ hotu, evaṁ me viññāṇaṁ mā ahosī’ti.
sn22.59:6.4_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.59:6.6_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.59:6.14_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.59:6.16_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.59:7.1_2: yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.59:7.1_6: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.59:8.1_0: Yā kāci vedanā atītānāgatapaccuppannā ajjhattā vā bahiddhā vā …pe…
sn22.59:8.1_5: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.59:9.2_0: ye keci saṅkhārā atītānāgatapaccuppannā ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā …pe…
sn22.59:9.2_5: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.59:10.1_0: Yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.59:10.1_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.59:11.2_0: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.59:11.3_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.59:12.2_0: Attamanā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanduṁ.
sn22.59:12.3_0: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne pañcavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṁsūti.
sn22.60:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
sn22.60:1.3_0: Atha kho mahāli licchavi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn22.60:1.3_1: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho mahāli licchavi bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.60:2.4_0: Natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṁ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:3.1_0: “Atthi, mahāli, hetu atthi paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:3.3_0: Atthi, mahāli, hetu, atthi paccayo sattānaṁ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:4.1_0: “Katamo pana, bhante, hetu katamo paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:5.1_1: ekantadukkhaṁ abhavissa dukkhānupatitaṁ dukkhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ sukhena,
sn22.60:5.2_1: rūpaṁ sukhaṁ sukhānupatitaṁ sukhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ dukkhena,
sn22.60:5.4_0: Ayaṁ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:6.1_1: ekantadukkhā abhavissa dukkhānupatitā dukkhāvakkantā anavakkantā sukhena,
sn22.60:6.2_1: vedanā sukhā sukhānupatitā sukhāvakkantā anavakkantā dukkhena,
sn22.60:6.5_0: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:7.2_1: ekantadukkhā abhavissaṁsu dukkhānupatitā dukkhāvakkantā anavakkantā sukhena,
sn22.60:7.3_1: saṅkhārā sukhā sukhānupatitā sukhāvakkantā anavakkantā dukkhena,
sn22.60:7.6_0: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:8.1_1: ekantadukkhaṁ abhavissa dukkhānupatitaṁ dukkhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ sukhena,
sn22.60:8.2_1: viññāṇaṁ sukhaṁ sukhānupatitaṁ sukhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ dukkhena,
sn22.60:8.4_0: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu ayaṁ paccayo sattānaṁ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:9.1_0: “Katamo pana, bhante, hetu katamo paccayo sattānaṁ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:9.3_1: ekantasukhaṁ abhavissa sukhānupatitaṁ sukhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ dukkhena,
sn22.60:9.4_1: rūpaṁ dukkhaṁ dukkhānupatitaṁ dukkhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ sukhena,
sn22.60:9.6_0: Ayaṁ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, sattānaṁ visuddhiyā.
sn22.60:10.1_0: Vedanā ca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantasukhā abhavissa …pe…
sn22.60:10.3_0: saṅkhārā ca hidaṁ, mahāli, ekantasukhā abhavissaṁsu …pe…
sn22.60:10.4_1: ekantasukhaṁ abhavissa sukhānupatitaṁ sukhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ dukkhena,
sn22.60:10.5_1: viññāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ dukkhānupatitaṁ dukkhāvakkantaṁ anavakkantaṁ sukhena,
sn22.60:10.7_0: Ayaṁ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, sattānaṁ visuddhiyā.
sn22.61:1.2_0: “Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, ādittaṁ, vedanā ādittā, saññā ādittā, saṅkhārā ādittā, viññāṇaṁ ādittaṁ.
sn22.61:1.4_0: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.61:1.5_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.62:1.4_2: rūpaṁ atītaṁ niruddhaṁ vipariṇataṁ ‘ahosī’ti tassa saṅkhā,
sn22.62:1.5_0: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.62:2.1_0: Yā vedanā atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā ‘ahosī’ti tassā saṅkhā,
sn22.62:2.2_0: na tassā saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassā saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.62:3.2_0: ye saṅkhārā atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā ‘ahesun’ti tesaṁ saṅkhā,
sn22.62:3.3_0: na tesaṁ saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tesaṁ saṅkhā ‘bhavissantī’ti.
sn22.62:4.2_0: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.62:5.2_0: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti.
sn22.62:6.2_0: na tassā saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassā saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti.
sn22.62:7.3_0: na tesaṁ saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tesaṁ saṅkhā ‘ahesun’ti.
sn22.62:8.2_0: na tassa saṅkhā ‘atthī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti.
sn22.62:9.2_0: na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.62:10.1_0: Yā vedanā jātā pātubhūtā, ‘atthī’ti tassā saṅkhā, ‘atthī’ti tassā samaññā, ‘atthī’ti tassā paññatti;
sn22.62:10.2_0: na tassā saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti, na tassā saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.62:11.3_0: na tesaṁ saṅkhā ‘ahesun’ti, na tesaṁ saṅkhā, ‘bhavissantī’ti.
sn22.62:12.2_0: na tassa saṅkhā ‘ahosī’ti, na tassa saṅkhā ‘bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.62:13.1_2: tayo niruttipathā adhivacanapathā paññattipathā asaṅkiṇṇā asaṅkiṇṇapubbā,
sn22.62:13.2_2: ahesuṁ ukkalā vassabhaññā ahetukavādā akiriyavādā natthikavādā,
sn22.62:13.2_3: tepime tayo niruttipathe adhivacanapathe paññattipathe na garahitabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ amaññiṁsu.
sn22.63:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn22.63:1.3_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.63:1.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.63:1.4_1: bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desetu yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.63:2.1_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.63:2.10_0: Imassa khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.63:3.2_0: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsi.
sn22.63:3.3_0: Rūpaṁ kho, bhikkhu, upādiyamāno baddho mārassa;
sn22.63:3.10_0: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
sn22.63:4.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
sn22.63:4.2_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti,
sn22.63:4.2_1: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
sn22.63:4.3_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn22.63:4.4_0: Aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosīti.

sn22.71:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā rādho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.71:1.3_1: kathaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti?
sn22.71:1.4_1: rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.71:1.4_5: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
sn22.71:1.8_5: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
sn22.71:1.9_1: jānato evaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti …pe…
sn22.71:1.10_0: aññataro ca panāyasmā rādho arahataṁ ahosīti.
sn22.72:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā surādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.72:1.3_1: jānato kathaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānāpagataṁ mānasaṁ hoti,
sn22.72:1.4_6: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā anupādāvimutto hoti.
sn22.72:1.8_0: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.72:1.11_3: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā anupādāvimutto hoti.
sn22.72:1.12_1: jānato evaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye,
sn22.72:1.12_2: bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānāpagataṁ mānasaṁ hoti vidhā samatikkantaṁ santaṁ suvimuttan”ti …pe…
sn22.72:1.13_0: aññataro ca panāyasmā surādho arahataṁ ahosīti.
sn22.73:1.2_0: “Assutavā, bhikkhave, puthujjano rūpassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.

sn22.73:1.11_0: viññāṇassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī”ti.

sn22.76:1.5_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.76:1.12_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.76:2.2_0: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.76:2.3_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.76:2.4_0: Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattāvāsā, yāvatā bhavaggaṁ, ete aggā, ete seṭṭhā lokasmiṁ yadidaṁ arahanto”ti.
sn22.76:3.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn22.77:2.2_0: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.77:2.3_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.77:2.4_0: Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattāvāsā, yāvatā bhavaggaṁ, ete aggā, ete seṭṭhā lokasmiṁ yadidaṁ arahanto”ti.
sn22.78:1.2_5: samantā catuddisā anuviloketvā tikkhattuṁ sīhanādaṁ nadati;
sn22.78:1.3_2: tiracchānagatā pāṇā sīhassa migarañño nadato saddaṁ suṇanti;
sn22.78:1.4_4: tepi tāni bandhanāni sañchinditvā sampadāletvā bhītā muttakarīsaṁ cajamānā,
sn22.78:2.1_2: yadā tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi
sn22.78:2.2_0: ‘iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
sn22.78:2.6_0: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.
sn22.78:2.7_2: devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā uccesu vimānesu ciraṭṭhitikā tepi tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṁ sutvā
sn22.78:2.8_0: ‘aniccāva kira, bho, mayaṁ samānā niccamhāti amaññimha.
sn22.78:2.9_0: Addhuvāva kira, bho, mayaṁ samānā dhuvamhāti amaññimha.
sn22.78:2.10_0: Asassatāva kira, bho, mayaṁ samānā sassatamhāti amaññimha.
sn22.78:2.11_0: Mayampi kira, bho, aniccā addhuvā asassatā sakkāyapariyāpannā’ti.
sn22.78:2.12_0: Evaṁ mahiddhiko kho, bhikkhave, tathāgato sadevakassa lokassa, evaṁ mahesakkho, evaṁ mahānubhāvo”ti.
sn22.79:1.2_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussaramānā anussaranti sabbete pañcupādānakkhandhe anussaranti etesaṁ vā aññataraṁ.
sn22.79:1.5_0: iti vā hi, bhikkhave, anussaramāno rūpaṁyeva anussarati.
sn22.79:1.7_0: iti vā hi, bhikkhave, anussaramāno vedanaṁyeva anussarati.
sn22.79:1.11_0: iti vā hi, bhikkhave, anussaramāno viññāṇameva anussarati.
sn22.79:3.4_0: Sukhampi vedayati, dukkhampi vedayati, adukkhamasukhampi vedayati.
sn22.79:4.4_0: Nīlampi sañjānāti, pītakampi sañjānāti, lohitakampi sañjānāti, odātampi sañjānāti.
sn22.79:7.1_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
sn22.79:7.3_0: Atītampāhaṁ addhānaṁ evameva rūpena khajjiṁ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannena rūpena khajjāmi.
sn22.79:7.4_0: Ahañceva kho pana anāgataṁ rūpaṁ abhinandeyyaṁ,
sn22.79:7.5_0: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya atītasmiṁ rūpasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:7.7_0: paccuppannassa rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.79:8.2_0: Atītampāhaṁ addhānaṁ evameva vedanāya khajjiṁ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannāya vedanāya khajjāmi.
sn22.79:8.3_0: Ahañceva kho pana anāgataṁ vedanaṁ abhinandeyyaṁ;
sn22.79:8.5_0: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya atītāya vedanāya anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:8.7_0: paccuppannāya vedanāya nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.79:9.4_0: Ahañceva kho pana anāgate saṅkhāre abhinandeyyaṁ;
sn22.79:9.6_0: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya atītesu saṅkhāresu anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:9.8_0: paccuppannānaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.79:10.2_0: Atītampi addhānaṁ evameva viññāṇena khajjiṁ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannena viññāṇena khajjāmi.
sn22.79:10.3_0: Ahañceva kho pana anāgataṁ viññāṇaṁ abhinandeyyaṁ;
sn22.79:10.5_0: So iti paṭisaṅkhāya atītasmiṁ viññāṇasmiṁ anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:10.7_0: paccuppannassa viññāṇassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn22.79:11.4_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.79:11.6_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.79:11.14_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.79:11.16_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.79:11.19_2: yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.79:11.19_6: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.79:11.23_5: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.79:12.1_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako apacināti, no ācināti;
sn22.79:13.2_0: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.79:13.3_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.79:14.1_8: neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti vidhūpetvā ṭhito
sn22.79:14.2_0: Kiñca nevācināti na apacināti, apacinitvā ṭhito?
sn22.79:14.3_0: Rūpaṁ nevācināti na apacināti, apacinitvā ṭhito;
sn22.79:14.7_0: viññāṇaṁ nevācināti na apacināti, apacinitvā ṭhito.
sn22.79:14.8_0: Kiñca neva pajahati na upādiyati, pajahitvā ṭhito?
sn22.79:14.9_0: Rūpaṁ neva pajahati na upādiyati, pajahitvā ṭhito;
sn22.79:14.13_0: viññāṇaṁ neva pajahati na upādiyati, pajahitvā ṭhito.
sn22.79:14.14_0: Kiñca neva visineti na ussineti, visinetvā ṭhito?
sn22.79:14.15_0: Rūpaṁ neva visineti na ussineti, visinetvā ṭhito;
sn22.79:14.19_0: viññāṇaṁ neva visineti na ussineti, visinetvā ṭhito.
sn22.79:14.20_0: Kiñca neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti, vidhūpetvā ṭhito?
sn22.79:14.21_0: Rūpaṁ neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti, vidhūpetvā ṭhito;
sn22.79:14.25_0: viññāṇaṁ neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti, vidhūpetvā ṭhito.
sn22.79:14.26_0: Evaṁvimuttacittaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṁ saindā devā sabrahmakā sapajāpatikā ārakāva namassanti:
sn22.80:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
sn22.80:1.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā kismiñcideva pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ paṇāmetvā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kapilavatthuṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn22.80:1.3_0: Kapilavatthusmiṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena mahāvanaṁ tenupasaṅkami divāvihārāya.
sn22.80:1.4_0: Mahāvanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā beluvalaṭṭhikāya mūle divāvihāraṁ nisīdi.
sn22.80:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.80:2.3_0: Santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ.
sn22.80:2.4_0: Tesaṁ mamaṁ apassantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:2.5_0: Seyyathāpi nāma vacchassa taruṇassa mātaraṁ apassantassa siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo;
sn22.80:2.6_0: evameva santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ tesaṁ mamaṁ apassantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:2.7_0: Seyyathāpi nāma bījānaṁ taruṇānaṁ udakaṁ alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo;
sn22.80:2.9_0: tesaṁ mamaṁ alabhantānaṁ dassanāya siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:2.10_0: Yannūnāhaṁ yatheva mayā pubbe bhikkhusaṅgho anuggahito,
sn22.80:3.1_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampati bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ
sn22.80:3.1_1: vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya pasāritaṁ vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya;
sn22.80:3.2_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampati ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.80:3.5_0: Santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ.
sn22.80:3.6_0: Tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ apassantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:3.7_0: Seyyathāpi nāma vacchassa taruṇassa mātaraṁ apassantassa siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo;
sn22.80:3.8_0: evameva santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ apassantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:3.9_0: Seyyathāpi nāma bījānaṁ taruṇānaṁ udakaṁ alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo;
sn22.80:3.10_0: evameva santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ,
sn22.80:3.10_1: tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ alabhantānaṁ dassanāya siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo.
sn22.80:3.13_0: Yatheva bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṅgho anuggahito, evameva etarahi anuggaṇhātu bhikkhusaṅghan”ti.
sn22.80:4.2_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampati bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
sn22.80:5.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena nigrodhārāmo tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.80:5.2_0: Nisajja kho bhagavā tathārūpaṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkhāsi yathā te bhikkhū ekadvīhikāya sārajjamānarūpā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkameyyuṁ.
sn22.80:5.3_0: Tepi bhikkhū ekadvīhikāya sārajjamānarūpā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn22.80:5.3_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.80:6.2_0: Abhisāpoyaṁ, bhikkhave, lokasmiṁ piṇḍolo vicarasi pattapāṇīti.
sn22.80:6.3_0: Tañca kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, kulaputtā upenti atthavasikā, atthavasaṁ paṭicca;
sn22.80:6.4_0: neva rājābhinītā, na corābhinītā, na iṇaṭṭā, na bhayaṭṭā, na ājīvikāpakatā;
sn22.80:6.5_0: api ca kho otiṇṇāmha jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇā dukkhaparetā
sn22.80:6.6_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethāti.
sn22.80:7.2_0: So ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo.
sn22.80:7.4_0: Tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ puggalaṁ vadāmi gihibhogā ca parihīno, sāmaññatthañca na paripūreti.
sn22.80:8.3_0: Ime ca bhikkhave, tayo akusalavitakkā kva aparisesā nirujjhanti?
sn22.80:8.4_0: Catūsu vā satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittassa viharato animittaṁ vā samādhiṁ bhāvayato.
sn22.80:8.5_0: Yāvañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, alameva animitto samādhi bhāvetuṁ.
sn22.80:8.6_0: Animitto, bhikkhave, samādhi bhāvito bahulīkato mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṁso.
sn22.80:9.3_0: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
sn22.80:9.4_0: ‘atthi nu kho taṁ kiñci lokasmiṁ yamahaṁ upādiyamāno na vajjavā assan’ti?
sn22.80:9.6_0: ‘natthi nu kho taṁ kiñci lokasmiṁ yamahaṁ upādiyamāno na vajjavā assaṁ.
sn22.80:10.4_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.80:10.6_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.81:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
sn22.81:1.2_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kosambiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn22.81:1.3_0: Kosambiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto sāmaṁ senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya
sn22.81:1.3_1: anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ eko adutiyo cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
sn22.81:2.1_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu acirapakkantassa bhagavato yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.81:2.2_1: bhagavā sāmaṁ senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ eko adutiyo cārikaṁ pakkanto”ti.
sn22.81:2.3_1: samaye bhagavā sāmaṁ senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anāmantetvā upaṭṭhāke anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ eko adutiyo cārikaṁ pakkamati,
sn22.81:2.3_2: ekova bhagavā tasmiṁ samaye viharitukāmo hoti;
sn22.81:2.4_0: na bhagavā tasmiṁ samaye kenaci anubandhitabbo hotī”ti.
sn22.81:3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena pālileyyakaṁ tadavasari.
sn22.81:3.2_0: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā pālileyyake viharati bhaddasālamūle.
sn22.81:3.3_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn22.81:3.4_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
sn22.81:3.4_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.81:3.5_0: “cirassutā kho no, āvuso ānanda, bhagavato sammukhā dhammī kathā;
sn22.81:3.6_0: icchāma mayaṁ, āvuso ānanda, bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṁ kathaṁ sotun”ti.
sn22.81:4.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando tehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ yena pālileyyakaṁ bhaddasālamūlaṁ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.81:4.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
sn22.81:4.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.81:4.4_0: “kathaṁ nu kho jānato kathaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti?
sn22.81:4.5_0: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn22.81:4.14_0: Evaṁ vicayaso desito, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo.
sn22.81:4.15_2: mayā dhamme atha ca panidhekaccassa bhikkhuno evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.81:4.16_0: ‘kathaṁ nu kho jānato kathaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī’ti?
sn22.81:5.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, jānato kathaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti?
sn22.81:5.2_1: assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto,
sn22.81:5.2_2: sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
sn22.81:5.4_0: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:5.5_0: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:5.6_0: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:5.8_0: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:5.10_0: Sāpi vedanā, sopi phasso anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:5.12_0: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:6.1_0: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati;
sn22.81:6.2_0: api ca kho rūpavantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati.
sn22.81:6.3_0: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:6.4_0: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:6.5_0: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:6.7_0: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:6.12_0: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:7.1_0: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati;
sn22.81:7.2_0: api ca kho attani rūpaṁ samanupassati.
sn22.81:7.3_0: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:7.4_0: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:7.5_0: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:7.7_0: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:7.12_0: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:8.1_0: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:8.2_0: api ca kho rūpasmiṁ attānaṁ samanupassati.
sn22.81:8.3_0: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:8.4_0: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:8.5_0: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:8.7_0: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:8.12_0: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato …pe… āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:9.1_0: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:9.2_0: api ca kho vedanaṁ attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:9.2_1: api ca kho vedanāvantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati,
sn22.81:9.2_2: api ca kho attani vedanaṁ samanupassati,
sn22.81:9.2_3: api ca kho vedanāya attānaṁ samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.4_0: api ca kho saṅkhāre attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:9.4_1: api ca kho saṅkhāravantaṁ attānaṁ samanupassati,
sn22.81:9.4_2: api ca kho attani saṅkhāre samanupassati,
sn22.81:9.4_3: api ca kho saṅkhāresu attānaṁ samanupassati;
sn22.81:9.5_0: api ca kho viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:9.5_3: api ca kho viññāṇasmiṁ attānaṁ samanupassati.
sn22.81:9.6_0: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, samanupassanā saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:9.8_0: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:9.10_0: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:9.15_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:10.1_0: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:10.7_0: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti.
sn22.81:10.8_0: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, sassatadiṭṭhi saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:10.10_0: evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:11.1_0: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati,
sn22.81:11.7_0: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti.
sn22.81:11.9_0: ‘no cassaṁ no ca me siyā nābhavissaṁ na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.81:11.10_0: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, ucchedadiṭṭhi saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:11.11_0: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:11.12_0: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:11.14_0: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco …pe…
sn22.81:11.15_0: evampi kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.81:12.1_0: Na heva kho rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na vedanaṁ …
sn22.81:12.5_0: na viññāṇasmiṁ attato samanupassati, nāpi evaṁdiṭṭhi hoti:
sn22.81:12.6_0: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti;
sn22.81:12.8_0: ‘no cassaṁ no ca me siyā nābhavissaṁ na me bhavissatī’ti;
sn22.81:12.9_0: api ca kho kaṅkhī hoti vicikicchī aniṭṭhaṅgato saddhamme.
sn22.81:12.10_0: Yā kho pana sā, bhikkhave, kaṅkhitā vicikicchitā aniṭṭhaṅgatatā saddhamme saṅkhāro so.
sn22.81:12.11_0: So pana saṅkhāro kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn22.81:12.12_0: Avijjāsamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phuṭṭhassa assutavato puthujjanassa uppannā taṇhā;
sn22.81:12.14_0: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sopi saṅkhāro anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno.
sn22.81:12.19_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato anantarā āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti.
sn22.82:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ.
sn22.82:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ajjhokāse nisinno hoti.
sn22.82:2.1_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.82:2.2_2: sace me bhagavā okāsaṁ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti?
sn22.82:2.3_0: “Tena hi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, sake āsane nisīditvā puccha yadākaṅkhasī”ti.
sn22.82:2.4_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā sake āsane nisīditvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.82:3.3_1: bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṁ uttariṁ pañhaṁ apucchi:
sn22.82:4.3_1: upādānaṁ te pañcupādānakkhandhā udāhu aññatra pañcahi upādānakkhandhehi upādānan”ti?
sn22.82:4.4_1: taññeva upādānaṁ te pañcupādānakkhandhā nāpi aññatra pañcahi upādānakkhandhehi upādānaṁ,
sn22.82:4.4_2: api ca yo tattha chandarāgo taṁ tattha upādānan”ti.
sn22.82:4.5_0: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu …pe… uttariṁ pañhaṁ apucchi:
sn22.82:5.5_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, siyā pañcupādānakkhandhesu chandarāgavemattatā”ti?
sn22.82:5.6_0: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu …pe… uttariṁ pañhaṁ apucchi:
sn22.82:6.2_1: rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.82:6.6_0: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.82:7.1_0: “Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāya;
sn22.82:7.2_0: ko hetu ko paccayo vedanākkhandhassa paññāpanāya;
sn22.82:7.3_0: ko hetu ko paccayo saññākkhandhassa paññāpanāya;
sn22.82:7.4_0: ko hetu ko paccayo saṅkhārakkhandhassa paññāpanāya;
sn22.82:7.5_0: ko hetu ko paccayo viññāṇakkhandhassa paññāpanāyā”ti?
sn22.82:7.6_0: “Cattāro kho, bhikkhu, mahābhūtā hetu, cattāro mahābhūtā paccayo rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāya.
sn22.82:7.7_0: Phasso hetu phasso paccayo vedanākkhandhassa paññāpanāya.
sn22.82:7.8_0: Phasso hetu phasso paccayo saññākkhandhassa paññāpanāya.
sn22.82:7.9_0: Phasso hetu, phasso paccayo saṅkhārakkhandhassa paññāpanāya.
sn22.82:7.10_0: Nāmarūpaṁ hetu, nāmarūpaṁ paccayo viññāṇakkhandhassa paññāpanāyā”ti.
sn22.82:8.2_1: assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto,
sn22.82:8.2_2: sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
sn22.82:8.3_0: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ;
sn22.82:8.7_0: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.82:9.2_1: sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto,
sn22.82:9.2_2: sappurisānaṁ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto
sn22.82:9.3_0: na rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā rūpaṁ, na rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ;
sn22.82:9.8_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, sakkāyadiṭṭhi na hotī”ti.
sn22.82:10.1_0: “Ko nu kho, bhante, rūpassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ;
sn22.82:10.5_0: ko viññāṇassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn22.82:10.6_0: “Yaṁ kho, bhikkhu, rūpaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—ayaṁ rūpassa assādo.
sn22.82:10.7_0: Yaṁ rūpaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ—ayaṁ rūpassa ādīnavo.
sn22.82:10.8_0: Yo rūpasmiṁ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ—idaṁ rūpassa nissaraṇaṁ.
sn22.82:10.12_0: yaṁ viññāṇaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ—ayaṁ viññāṇassa assādo.
sn22.82:10.13_0: Yaṁ viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ—ayaṁ viññāṇassa ādīnavo.
sn22.82:10.14_0: Yo viññāṇasmiṁ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ—idaṁ viññāṇassa nissaraṇan”ti.
sn22.82:10.15_1: bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṁ uttariṁ pañhaṁ apucchi:
sn22.82:11.1_1: kathaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti?
sn22.82:11.2_1: rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.82:11.2_5: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
sn22.82:11.6_0: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.82:11.6_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
