sn22.82:11.7_1: jānato evaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti.
sn22.82:12.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.82:12.2_0: “iti kira bho rūpaṁ anattā, vedanā … saññā … saṅkhārā … viññāṇaṁ anattā;
sn22.82:12.4_0: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā ceto parivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn22.82:13.1_2: vijjati yaṁ idhekacco moghapuriso avidvā avijjāgato taṇhādhipateyyena cetasā satthusāsanaṁ atidhāvitabbaṁ maññeyya.
sn22.82:13.2_0: ‘Iti kira, bho, rūpaṁ anattā, vedanā … saññā … saṅkhārā … viññāṇaṁ anattā.
sn22.82:13.4_0: Paṭipucchāvinītā kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, tatra tatra tesu tesu dhammesu.
sn22.82:14.9_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.82:14.11_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.83:1.2_0: Tatra kho āyasmā ānando bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn22.83:1.4_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paccassosuṁ.
sn22.83:2.1_0: “Puṇṇo nāma, āvuso, āyasmā mantāṇiputto amhākaṁ navakānaṁ sataṁ bahūpakāro hoti.
sn22.83:2.3_0: ‘upādāya, āvuso ānanda, asmīti hoti, no anupādāya.
sn22.83:2.4_0: Kiñca upādāya asmīti hoti, no anupādāya?
sn22.83:2.5_0: Rūpaṁ upādāya asmīti hoti, no anupādāya.
sn22.83:2.9_0: viññāṇaṁ upādāya asmīti hoti, no anupādāya.
sn22.83:3.1_2: itthī vā puriso vā daharo yuvā maṇḍanakajātiko ādāse vā parisuddhe pariyodāte acche vā udakapatte sakaṁ
sn22.83:3.2_0: evameva kho, āvuso ānanda, rūpaṁ upādāya asmīti hoti, no anupādāya.
sn22.83:3.6_0: viññāṇaṁ upādāya asmīti hoti, no anupādāya.
sn22.83:4.12_0: Puṇṇo nāma, āvuso, āyasmā mantāṇiputto amhākaṁ navakānaṁ sataṁ bahūpakāro hoti.
sn22.83:4.14_0: Idañca pana me āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtassa dhammadesanaṁ sutvā dhammo abhisamito”ti.
sn22.84:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā tisso bhagavato pitucchāputto sambahulānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ evamāroceti:
sn22.84:2.1_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn22.84:2.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.84:2.2_0: “āyasmā, bhante, tisso bhagavato pitucchāputto sambahulānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ evamāroceti:
sn22.84:3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
sn22.84:3.2_0: “ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena tissaṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantehī”ti.
sn22.84:3.3_1: bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā tisso tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.84:3.5_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā tisso tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.84:3.5_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ tissaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn22.84:3.6_0: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, tissa, sambahulānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ evamārocesi:
sn22.84:3.7_0: ‘api me, āvuso, madhurakajāto viya kāyo …pe… hoti ca me dhammesu vicikicchā’”ti?
sn22.84:3.10_0: rūpe avigatarāgassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipāsassa avigatapariḷāhassa avigatataṇhassa,
sn22.84:5.3_1: viññāṇe avigatarāgassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipāsassa avigatapariḷāhassa avigatataṇhassa,
sn22.84:6.5_0: rūpe vigatarāgassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipāsassa vigatapariḷāhassa vigatataṇhassa,
sn22.84:7.7_0: viññāṇe vigatarāgassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipāsassa vigatapariḷāhassa vigatataṇhassa
sn22.84:9.2_0: eko puriso amaggakusalo, eko puriso maggakusalo.
sn22.84:9.3_0: Tamenaṁ so amaggakusalo puriso amuṁ maggakusalaṁ purisaṁ maggaṁ puccheyya.
sn22.84:9.7_0: Tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi dvedhāpathaṁ, tattha vāmaṁ muñcitvā dakkhiṇaṁ gaṇhāhi.
sn22.84:9.9_0: Tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi tibbaṁ vanasaṇḍaṁ.
sn22.84:9.11_0: Tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi mahantaṁ ninnaṁ pallalaṁ.
sn22.84:9.13_0: Tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi sobbhaṁ papātaṁ.
sn22.84:9.15_0: Tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi samaṁ bhūmibhāgaṁ ramaṇīyan’ti.
sn22.84:10.1_0: Upamā kho myāyaṁ, tissa, katā atthassa viññāpanāya.
sn22.84:10.4_0: ‘Puriso maggakusalo’ti kho, tissa, tathāgatassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
sn22.84:10.6_0: ‘Vāmo maggo’ti kho, tissa, aṭṭhaṅgikassetaṁ micchāmaggassa adhivacanaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.84:10.8_0: ‘Dakkhiṇo maggo’ti kho, tissa, ariyassetaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacanaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.84:10.11_0: ‘Mahantaṁ ninnaṁ pallalan’ti kho, tissa, kāmānametaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
sn22.84:10.13_0: ‘Samo bhūmibhāgo ramaṇīyo’ti kho, tissa, nibbānassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
sn22.84:11.2_0: Attamano āyasmā tisso bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
sn22.85:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā sāriputto sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn22.85:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena yamakassa nāma bhikkhuno evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti:
sn22.85:1.3_1: yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati,
sn22.85:2.1_0: Assosuṁ kho sambahulā bhikkhū yamakassa kira nāma bhikkhuno evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti:
sn22.85:2.2_1: yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati,
sn22.85:2.3_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū yenāyasmā yamako tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn22.85:2.4_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
sn22.85:2.4_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ yamakaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.85:3.1_0: “Saccaṁ kira te, āvuso yamaka, evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ:
sn22.85:3.2_1: yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati,
sn22.85:3.3_0: “Evaṁ khvāhaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi:
sn22.85:3.4_0: ‘khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn22.85:4.2_0: ‘khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn22.85:4.3_0: Evampi kho āyasmā yamako tehi bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva taṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissa voharati:
sn22.85:4.4_1: yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati,
sn22.85:5.1_0: Yato kho te bhikkhū nāsakkhiṁsu āyasmantaṁ yamakaṁ etasmā pāpakā diṭṭhigatā vivecetuṁ,
sn22.85:5.1_1: atha kho te bhikkhū uṭṭhāyāsanā yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn22.85:5.2_0: “yamakassa nāma, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhuno evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ:
sn22.85:5.3_0: ‘tathāhaṁ bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati,
sn22.85:5.4_0: Sādhāyasmā sāriputto yena yamako bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
sn22.85:5.6_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā yamako tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.85:5.6_2: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ yamakaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.85:6.1_0: “Saccaṁ kira te, āvuso yamaka, evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ:
sn22.85:6.2_1: yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati,
sn22.85:6.3_2: yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati,
sn22.85:10.2_0: rūpaṁ … vedanaṁ … saññaṁ … saṅkhāre … viññāṇaṁ tathāgatoti samanupassasī”ti?
sn22.85:11.2_0: ayaṁ so arūpī … avedano … asaññī … asaṅkhāro … aviññāṇo tathāgatoti samanupassasī”ti?
sn22.85:11.4_2: diṭṭheva dhamme saccato thetato tathāgate anupalabbhiyamāne,
sn22.85:11.5_1: yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati,
sn22.85:12.1_0: “Ahu kho me taṁ, āvuso sāriputta, pubbe aviddasuno pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ;
sn22.85:12.2_0: idañca panāyasmato sāriputtassa dhammadesanaṁ sutvā tañceva pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ pahīnaṁ,
sn22.85:13.2_0: ‘yo so, āvuso yamaka, bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo so kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā kiṁ hotī’ti?
sn22.85:13.3_0: Evaṁ puṭṭho tvaṁ, āvuso yamaka, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn22.85:13.5_0: ‘yo so, āvuso yamaka, bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo so kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā kiṁ hotī’ti?
sn22.85:14.2_0: Tena hāvuso yamaka, upamaṁ te karissāmi etasseva atthassa bhiyyoso mattāya ñāṇāya.
sn22.85:14.3_0: Seyyathāpi, āvuso yamaka, gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo;
sn22.85:14.5_0: Tassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya anatthakāmo ahitakāmo ayogakkhemakāmo jīvitā voropetukāmo.
sn22.85:14.7_0: ‘ayaṁ kho gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo;
sn22.85:14.11_0: So taṁ gahapatiṁ vā gahapatiputtaṁ vā upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeyya:
sn22.85:14.13_0: Tamenaṁ so gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā upaṭṭhāpeyya.
sn22.85:14.14_0: So upaṭṭhaheyya pubbuṭṭhāyī pacchānipātī kiṅkārapaṭissāvī manāpacārī piyavādī.
sn22.85:14.15_0: Tassa so gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā mittatopi naṁ saddaheyya;
sn22.85:14.18_0: Yadā kho, āvuso, tassa purisassa evamassa:
sn22.85:14.19_0: ‘saṁvissattho kho myāyaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā’ti,
sn22.85:14.19_1: atha naṁ rahogataṁ viditvā tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropeyya.
sn22.85:15.2_0: yadā hi so puriso amuṁ gahapatiṁ vā gahapatiputtaṁ vā upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ āha:
sn22.85:15.6_0: Yadāpi so upaṭṭhahati pubbuṭṭhāyī pacchānipātī kiṅkārapaṭissāvī manāpacārī piyavādī,
sn22.85:15.9_0: Yadāpi naṁ rahogataṁ viditvā tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropeti, tadāpi so vadhakova.
sn22.85:15.13_1: assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto,
sn22.85:15.13_2: sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
sn22.85:15.14_0: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.85:15.18_0: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.85:16.1_0: So aniccaṁ rūpaṁ ‘aniccaṁ rūpan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
sn22.85:21.1_0: So rūpaṁ upeti upādiyati adhiṭṭhāti ‘attā me’ti.
sn22.85:21.6_0: Tassime pañcupādānakkhandhā upetā upādinnā dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya saṁvattanti.
sn22.85:22.1_0: Sutavā ca kho, āvuso, ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī …pe… sappurisadhamme suvinīto
sn22.85:22.2_0: na rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ attānaṁ; na attani rūpaṁ, na rūpasmiṁ attānaṁ.
sn22.85:22.6_0: na viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, na viññāṇavantaṁ attānaṁ;
sn22.85:22.7_0: na attani viññāṇaṁ, na viññāṇasmiṁ attānaṁ.
sn22.85:23.1_0: So aniccaṁ rūpaṁ ‘aniccaṁ rūpan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.85:28.1_0: So rūpaṁ na upeti, na upādiyati, nādhiṭṭhāti: ‘attā me’ti.
sn22.85:28.5_0: viññāṇaṁ na upeti, na upādiyati, nādhiṭṭhāti: ‘attā me’ti.
sn22.85:28.6_0: Tassime pañcupādānakkhandhā anupetā anupādinnā dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāya saṁvattantī”ti.
sn22.85:28.7_2: hoti yesaṁ āyasmantānaṁ tādisā sabrahmacārino anukampakā atthakāmā ovādakā anusāsakā.
sn22.85:28.8_0: Idañca pana me āyasmato sāriputtassa dhammadesanaṁ sutvā anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttan”ti.
sn22.86:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
sn22.86:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā anurādho bhagavato avidūre araññakuṭikāyaṁ viharati.
sn22.86:1.3_0: Atha kho sambahulā aññatitthiyā paribbājakā yenāyasmā anurādho tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn22.86:1.4_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
sn22.86:1.4_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā āyasmantaṁ anurādhaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.86:1.5_3: taṁ tathāgato imesu catūsu ṭhānesu paññāpayamāno paññāpeti:
sn22.86:1.6_2: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā,
sn22.86:1.6_3: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā”ti?
sn22.86:2.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā anurādho te aññatitthiye paribbājake etadavoca:
sn22.86:2.2_0: “yo so āvuso tathāgato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto taṁ tathāgato aññatra imehi catūhi ṭhānehi paññāpayamāno paññāpeti:
sn22.86:2.3_2: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā,
sn22.86:2.3_3: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā”ti.
sn22.86:2.4_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā āyasmantaṁ anurādhaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.86:2.5_0: “so cāyaṁ bhikkhu navo bhavissati acirapabbajito, thero vā pana bālo abyatto”ti.
sn22.86:2.6_0: Atha kho aññatitthiyā paribbājakā āyasmantaṁ anurādhaṁ navavādena ca bālavādena ca apasādetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṁsu.
sn22.86:3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmato anurādhassa acirapakkantesu tesu aññatitthiyesu paribbājakesu etadahosi:
sn22.86:3.2_0: “sace kho maṁ te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā uttariṁ pañhaṁ puccheyyuṁ.
sn22.86:3.3_0: Kathaṁ byākaramāno nu khvāhaṁ tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ vuttavādī ceva bhagavato assaṁ,
sn22.86:3.3_3: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgaccheyyā”ti?
sn22.86:4.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā anurādho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.86:4.1_2: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā anurādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.86:4.3_0: Atha kho, bhante, sambahulā aññatitthiyā paribbājakā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁsu …pe… maṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.86:4.4_2: tathāgato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto taṁ tathāgato imesu catūsu ṭhānesu paññāpayamāno paññāpeti—
sn22.86:4.5_0: hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti vā, na hoti …
sn22.86:4.6_0: hoti ca na ca hoti, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti vā’”ti?
sn22.86:5.1_0: Evaṁ vuttāhaṁ, bhante, te aññatitthiye paribbājake etadavocaṁ:
sn22.86:5.2_2: taṁ tathāgato aññatra imehi catūhi ṭhānehi paññāpayamāno paññāpeti:
sn22.86:5.4_0: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vāti.
sn22.86:5.5_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā maṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.86:5.6_0: ‘so cāyaṁ bhikkhu na vo bhavissati acirapabbajito thero vā pana bālo abyatto’ti.
sn22.86:5.7_1: te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā navavādena ca bālavādena ca apasādetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṁsu.
sn22.86:6.1_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, acirapakkantesu tesu aññatitthiyesu paribbājakesu etadahosi:
sn22.86:6.2_0: ‘sace kho maṁ te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā uttariṁ pañhaṁ puccheyyuṁ.
sn22.86:6.3_0: Kathaṁ byākaramāno nu khvāhaṁ tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ vuttavādī ceva bhagavato assaṁ,
sn22.86:6.3_3: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgaccheyyā’”ti?
sn22.86:7.4_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.86:7.6_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.86:10.2_0: rūpaṁ … vedanā … saññā … saṅkhārā … viññāṇaṁ tathāgatoti samanupassasī”ti?
sn22.86:11.2_0: ayaṁ so arūpī … avedano … asaññī … asaṅkhāro … aviññāṇo tathāgatoti samanupassasī”ti?
sn22.86:12.1_1: diṭṭheva dhamme saccato thetato tathāgate anupalabbhiyamāne kallaṁ nu te taṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ:
sn22.86:12.2_1: tathāgato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto taṁ tathāgato aññatra imehi catūhi ṭhānehi paññāpayamāno paññāpeti—
sn22.86:12.3_0: hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti vā … na hoti …
sn22.86:12.3_2: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇāti vā’”ti?
sn22.86:13.2_0: Pubbe cāhaṁ, anurādha, etarahi ca dukkhañceva paññapemi, dukkhassa ca nirodhan”ti.
sn22.87:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn22.87:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā vakkali kumbhakāranivesane viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn22.87:1.3_0: Atha kho āyasmā vakkali upaṭṭhāke āmantesi:
sn22.87:1.4_2: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha:
sn22.87:1.5_0: ‘vakkali, bhante, bhikkhu ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno, so bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī’ti.
sn22.87:1.7_0: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, bhagavā yena vakkali bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā’”ti.
sn22.87:1.8_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato vakkalissa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn22.87:1.8_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.87:1.9_0: “vakkali, bhante, bhikkhu ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno, so bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati;
sn22.87:1.11_0: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, bhagavā yena vakkali bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā’”ti.
sn22.87:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yenāyasmā vakkali tenupasaṅkami.
sn22.87:2.2_0: Addasā kho āyasmā vakkali bhagavantaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ. Disvāna mañcake samadhosi.
sn22.87:2.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ vakkaliṁ etadavoca:
sn22.87:2.6_0: Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ vakkaliṁ etadavoca:
sn22.87:2.9_0: “Kacci te, vakkali, na kiñci kukkuccaṁ, na koci vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn22.87:2.10_0: “Taggha me, bhante, anappakaṁ kukkuccaṁ, anappako vippaṭisāro”ti.
sn22.87:2.11_0: “Kacci pana taṁ, vakkali, attā sīlato na upavadatī”ti?
sn22.87:2.12_0: “Na kho maṁ, bhante, attā sīlato upavadatī”ti.
sn22.87:2.13_0: “No ce kira taṁ, vakkali, attā sīlato upavadati; atha kiñca te kukkuccaṁ ko ca vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn22.87:2.14_2: natthi ca me kāyasmiṁ tāvatikā balamattā,
sn22.87:3.1_0: “Alaṁ, vakkali, kiṁ te iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena?
sn22.87:3.2_0: Yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṁ passati so maṁ passati;
sn22.87:3.3_0: yo maṁ passati so dhammaṁ passati.
sn22.87:4.4_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.87:4.6_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn22.87:5.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ vakkaliṁ iminā ovādena ovaditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena gijjhakūṭo pabbato tena pakkāmi.
sn22.87:5.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā vakkali acirapakkantassa bhagavato upaṭṭhāke āmantesi:
sn22.87:5.3_0: “etha maṁ, āvuso, mañcakaṁ āropetvā yena isigilipassaṁ kāḷasilā tenupasaṅkamatha.
sn22.87:5.4_0: Kathañhi nāma mādiso antaraghare kālaṁ kattabbaṁ maññeyyā”ti?
sn22.87:5.5_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato vakkalissa paṭissutvā āyasmantaṁ vakkaliṁ mañcakaṁ āropetvā yena isigilipassaṁ kāḷasilā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu.
sn22.87:5.6_0: Atha kho bhagavā tañca rattiṁ tañca divāvasesaṁ gijjhakūṭe pabbate vihāsi.
sn22.87:5.7_0: Atha kho dve devatāyo abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ gijjhakūṭaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu …pe…
sn22.87:5.8_0: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho ekā devatā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.87:5.13_0: Idaṁ vatvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyiṁsu.
sn22.87:6.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn22.87:7.1_0: ‘Suṇāvuso tvaṁ, vakkali, bhagavato vacanaṁ dvinnañca devatānaṁ.
sn22.87:7.2_1: rattiṁ dve devatāyo abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ gijjhakūṭaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn22.87:7.3_0: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho, āvuso, ekā devatā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
sn22.87:7.6_0: so hi nūna, bhante, suvimutto vimuccissatīti.
sn22.87:7.7_0: Bhagavā ca taṁ, āvuso vakkali, evamāha—
sn22.87:7.10_0: Apāpakaṁ te maraṇaṁ bhavissati, apāpikā kālakiriyā’”ti.
sn22.87:7.11_1: bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā vakkali tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn22.87:8.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā vakkali upaṭṭhāke āmantesi:
sn22.87:8.3_0: Kathañhi nāma mādiso ucce āsane nisīditvā tassa bhagavato sāsanaṁ sotabbaṁ maññeyyā”ti.
sn22.87:8.4_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato vakkalissa paṭissutvā āyasmantaṁ vakkaliṁ mañcakā oropesuṁ.
sn22.87:8.5_0: “Imaṁ, āvuso, rattiṁ dve devatāyo abhikkantāya rattiyā …pe… ekamantaṁ aṭṭhaṁsu.
sn22.87:8.6_0: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho, āvuso, ekā devatā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.87:8.10_0: Bhagavā ca taṁ, āvuso vakkali, evamāha:
sn22.87:8.13_0: Apāpakaṁ te maraṇaṁ bhavissati, apāpikā kālakiriyā’”ti.
sn22.87:8.14_0: “Tena hāvuso, mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha:
sn22.87:8.21_0: Yadaniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṁ vāti na vicikicchāmi.
sn22.87:8.25_0: Yadaniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṁ vāti na vicikicchāmi.
sn22.87:8.30_0: Yadaniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṁ vāti na vicikicchāmi.
sn22.87:8.34_1: natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṁ vāti na vicikicchāmī’”ti.
sn22.87:8.35_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato vakkalissa paṭissutvā pakkamiṁsu.
sn22.87:8.36_0: Atha kho āyasmā vakkali acirapakkantesu tesu bhikkhūsu satthaṁ āharesi.
sn22.87:9.1_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn22.87:9.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.87:9.8_0: Yadaniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṁ vāti na vicikicchāmi.
sn22.87:9.15_1: natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṁ vāti na vicikicchāmī’”ti.
sn22.87:10.4_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn22.87:10.5_0: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ yena isigilipassaṁ kāḷasilā tenupasaṅkami.
sn22.87:10.6_0: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ vakkaliṁ dūratova mañcake vivattakkhandhaṁ semānaṁ.
sn22.87:11.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena dhūmāyitattaṁ timirāyitattaṁ gacchateva purimaṁ disaṁ,
sn22.87:11.3_2: etaṁ dhūmāyitattaṁ timirāyitattaṁ gacchateva purimaṁ disaṁ …pe…
sn22.87:11.5_0: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, māro pāpimā vakkalissa kulaputtassa viññāṇaṁ samanvesati:
sn22.87:11.7_0: Appatiṭṭhitena ca, bhikkhave, viññāṇena vakkali kulaputto parinibbuto”ti.
sn22.88:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn22.88:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā assaji kassapakārāme viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn22.88:1.3_0: Atha kho āyasmā assaji upaṭṭhāke āmantesi:
sn22.88:1.4_2: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha:
sn22.88:1.8_0: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, bhagavā yena assaji bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā’”ti.
sn22.88:1.9_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato assajissa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
sn22.88:1.9_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.88:1.11_0: sādhu kira, bhante, bhagavā yena assaji bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
sn22.88:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā assaji tenupasaṅkami.
sn22.88:2.2_0: Addasā kho āyasmā assaji bhagavantaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
sn22.88:2.4_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ assajiṁ etadavoca:
sn22.88:2.7_0: Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ assajiṁ etadavoca:
sn22.88:2.8_0: “kacci te, assaji, khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīyaṁ …pe… paṭikkamosānaṁ paññāyati no abhikkamo”ti?
sn22.88:3.1_0: “Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṁ …pe… abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati no paṭikkamo”ti.
sn22.88:3.2_0: “Kacci te, assaji, na kiñci kukkuccaṁ na koci vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn22.88:3.3_0: “Taggha me, bhante, anappakaṁ kukkuccaṁ anappako vippaṭisāro”ti.
sn22.88:3.4_0: “Kacci pana taṁ, assaji, attā sīlato na upavadatī”ti?
sn22.88:3.5_0: “Na kho maṁ, bhante, attā sīlato upavadatī”ti.
sn22.88:3.6_0: “No ce kira taṁ, assaji, attā sīlato upavadati, atha kiñca te kukkuccaṁ ko ca vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn22.88:3.8_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, taṁ samādhiṁ appaṭilabhato evaṁ hoti:
sn22.88:3.10_1: samaṇabrāhmaṇā samādhisārakā samādhisāmaññā tesaṁ taṁ samādhiṁ appaṭilabhataṁ evaṁ hoti:
sn22.88:4.10_0: Adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, sā ‘aniccā’ti pajānāti …pe… ‘anabhinanditā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:4.11_0: So sukhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, visaṁyutto naṁ vedayati;
sn22.88:4.12_0: dukkhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, visaṁyutto naṁ vedayati;
sn22.88:4.13_0: adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, visaṁyutto naṁ vedayati.
sn22.88:4.14_0: So kāyapariyantikañce vedanaṁ vedayamāno ‘kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:4.14_1: Jīvitapariyantikañce vedanaṁ vedayamāno ‘jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:4.15_0: ‘Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṁ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissantī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:5.1_0: Seyyathāpi, assaji, telañca paṭicca, vaṭṭiñca paṭicca, telappadīpo jhāyeyya;
sn22.88:5.2_0: tasseva telassa ca vaṭṭiyā ca pariyādānā anāhāro nibbāyeyya.
sn22.88:5.3_1: bhikkhu kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayamāno ‘kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:5.3_2: Jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayamāno ‘jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:5.4_0: ‘Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṁ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissantī’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.89:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ sambahulā therā bhikkhū kosambiyaṁ viharanti ghositārāme.
sn22.89:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā khemako badarikārāme viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn22.89:1.3_0: Atha kho therā bhikkhū sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitā āyasmantaṁ dāsakaṁ āmantesuṁ:
sn22.89:1.6_3: kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti,
sn22.89:1.7_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā dāsako therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭissutvā yenāyasmā khemako tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.89:1.10_0: “Na me, āvuso, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ …pe… abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati no paṭikkamo”ti.
sn22.89:2.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā dāsako yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū etadavoca:
sn22.89:2.3_0: ‘na me, āvuso, khamanīyaṁ …pe… abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati no paṭikkamo’”ti.
sn22.89:2.6_0: pañcime, āvuso, upādānakkhandhā vuttā bhagavatā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.89:2.8_0: Imesu āyasmā khemako pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu kiñci attaṁ vā attaniyaṁ vā samanupassatī’”ti?
sn22.89:3.1_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā dāsako therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭissutvā yenāyasmā khemako tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.89:3.5_0: Imesu āyasmā khemako pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu kiñci attaṁ vā attaniyaṁ vā samanupassatī”ti?
sn22.89:3.8_0: Imesu khvāhaṁ, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attaṁ vā attaniyaṁ vā samanupassāmī”ti.
sn22.89:4.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā dāsako yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū etadavoca:
sn22.89:4.5_0: Imesu khvāhaṁ, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attaṁ vā attaniyaṁ vā samanupassāmī’”ti.
sn22.89:4.8_0: pañcime, āvuso, upādānakkhandhā vuttā bhagavatā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.89:4.10_0: No ce kirāyasmā khemako imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu kiñci attaṁ vā attaniyaṁ vā samanupassati.
sn22.89:5.1_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā dāsako therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭissutvā yenāyasmā khemako …pe…
sn22.89:5.5_0: no ce kirāyasmā khemako imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu kiñci attaṁ vā attaniyaṁ vā samanupassati,
sn22.89:5.8_1: pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attaṁ vā attaniyaṁ vā samanupassāmi,
sn22.89:6.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā dāsako yena therā bhikkhū …pe…
sn22.89:6.4_0: pañcime, āvuso, upādānakkhandhā vuttā bhagavatā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.89:6.6_1: pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attaṁ vā attaniyaṁ vā samanupassāmi,
sn22.89:7.3_0: yametaṁ, āvuso khemaka, asmīti vadesi, kimetaṁ asmīti vadesi?
sn22.89:7.4_0: Rūpaṁ asmīti vadesi, aññatra rūpā asmīti vadesi,
sn22.89:7.8_0: viññāṇaṁ asmīti vadesi, aññatra viññāṇā asmīti vadesi.
sn22.89:7.9_0: Yametaṁ, āvuso khemaka, asmīti vadesi. Kimetaṁ asmīti vadesī’”ti?
sn22.89:8.1_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā dāsako therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭissutvā yenāyasmā khemako tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.89:8.9_0: Yametaṁ, āvuso khemaka, ‘asmī’ti vadesi, kimetaṁ ‘asmī’ti vadesī”ti?
sn22.89:9.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā khemako daṇḍamolubbha yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.89:9.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn22.89:9.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ khemakaṁ therā bhikkhū etadavocuṁ:
sn22.89:9.9_0: Yametaṁ, āvuso khemaka, ‘asmī’ti vadesi, kimetaṁ ‘asmī’ti vadesī”ti?
sn22.89:9.10_0: “Na khvāhaṁ, āvuso, rūpaṁ ‘asmī’ti vadāmi; napi aññatra rūpā ‘asmī’ti vadāmi.
sn22.89:9.14_0: na viññāṇaṁ ‘asmī’ti vadāmi; napi aññatra viññāṇā ‘asmī’ti vadāmi.
sn22.89:9.15_0: Api ca me, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ‘asmī’ti adhigataṁ ‘ayamahamasmī’ti na ca samanupassāmi.
sn22.89:10.1_0: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, uppalassa vā padumassa vā puṇḍarīkassa vā gandho.
sn22.89:10.2_1: ‘pattassa gandho’ti vā ‘vaṇṇassa gandho’ti vā ‘kiñjakkhassa gandho’ti vā sammā nu kho so vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
sn22.89:10.5_0: “‘Pupphassa gandho’ti kho, āvuso, sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”ti.
sn22.89:10.6_0: “Evameva khvāhaṁ, āvuso, na rūpaṁ ‘asmī’ti vadāmi, napi aññatra rūpā ‘asmī’ti vadāmi.
sn22.89:10.10_0: na viññāṇaṁ ‘asmī’ti vadāmi, napi aññatra viññāṇā ‘asmī’ti vadāmi.
sn22.89:10.11_0: Api ca me, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ‘asmī’ti adhigataṁ ‘ayamahamasmī’ti na ca samanupassāmi.
sn22.89:11.1_3: ‘yo ca pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu anusahagato asmīti māno,
sn22.89:11.2_0: So aparena samayena pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī viharati—
sn22.89:11.3_0: iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
sn22.89:11.7_0: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.
sn22.89:11.8_0: Tassimesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassino viharato yopissa hoti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu anusahagato ‘asmī’ti,
sn22.89:12.1_0: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, vatthaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhaṁ malaggahitaṁ. Tamenaṁ sāmikā rajakassa anupadajjuṁ.
sn22.89:12.2_0: Tamenaṁ rajako ūse vā khāre vā gomaye vā sammadditvā acche udake vikkhāleti.
sn22.89:12.3_0: Kiñcāpi taṁ hoti vatthaṁ parisuddhaṁ pariyodātaṁ,
sn22.89:12.3_1: atha khvassa hoti yeva anusahagato ūsagandho vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato.
sn22.89:12.4_0: Tamenaṁ rajako sāmikānaṁ deti. Tamenaṁ sāmikā gandhaparibhāvite karaṇḍake nikkhipanti.
sn22.89:12.5_0: Yopissa hoti anusahagato ūsagandho vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato,
sn22.89:12.6_1: kiñcāpi ariyasāvakassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni pahīnāni bhavanti,
sn22.89:12.6_2: atha khvassa hoti yeva pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu anusahagato ‘asmī’ti,
sn22.89:12.7_0: So aparena samayena pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī viharati.
sn22.89:12.8_0: ‘Iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
sn22.89:12.12_0: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.
sn22.89:12.13_0: Tassa imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassino viharato yopissa hoti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu anusahagato ‘asmī’ti,
sn22.89:13.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ khemakaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.89:13.2_0: “na kho mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ khemakaṁ vihesāpekhā pucchimha,
sn22.89:13.2_1: api cāyasmā khemako pahosi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṁ vitthārena ācikkhituṁ desetuṁ paññāpetuṁ paṭṭhapetuṁ vivarituṁ vibhajituṁ uttānīkātuṁ.
sn22.89:13.3_0: Tayidaṁ āyasmatā khemakena tassa bhagavato sāsanaṁ vitthārena ācikkhitaṁ desitaṁ paññāpitaṁ paṭṭhapitaṁ vivaritaṁ vibhajitaṁ uttānīkatan”ti.
sn22.89:14.2_0: Attamanā therā bhikkhū āyasmato khemakassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanduṁ.
sn22.89:14.3_0: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṁ therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṁsu,
sn22.90:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ sambahulā therā bhikkhū bārāṇasiyaṁ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn22.90:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā channo sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito avāpuraṇaṁ ādāya vihārena vihāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū etadavoca:
sn22.90:1.3_2: karontu me āyasmanto therā dhammiṁ kathaṁ,
sn22.90:2.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ channaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn22.90:3.11_0: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe dhammā anattā’ti.
sn22.90:3.12_0: Atha ca pana me sabbasaṅkhārasamathe sabbūpadhipaṭinissagge taṇhākkhaye virāge nirodhe nibbāne cittaṁ
sn22.90:3.12_1: na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
sn22.90:3.16_0: Na kho panevaṁ dhammaṁ passato hoti.
sn22.90:3.17_0: Ko nu kho me tathā dhammaṁ deseyya yathāhaṁ dhammaṁ passeyyan”ti.
sn22.90:4.2_0: “ayaṁ kho āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ,
sn22.90:4.2_1: pahoti ca me āyasmā ānando tathā dhammaṁ desetuṁ yathāhaṁ dhammaṁ passeyyaṁ;
sn22.90:4.3_0: atthi ca me āyasmante ānande tāvatikā vissaṭṭhi.
sn22.90:4.5_0: Atha kho āyasmā channo senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena kosambī ghositārāmo yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.90:4.5_2: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā channo āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.90:5.1_0: “Ekamidāhaṁ, āvuso ānanda, samayaṁ bārāṇasiyaṁ viharāmi isipatane migadāye.
sn22.90:5.2_1: sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito avāpuraṇaṁ ādāya vihārena vihāraṁ upasaṅkamiṁ;
sn22.90:5.4_2: karontu me āyasmanto therā dhammiṁ kathaṁ yathāhaṁ dhammaṁ passeyyan’ti.
sn22.90:5.5_0: Evaṁ vutte, maṁ, āvuso, therā bhikkhū etadavocuṁ:
sn22.90:5.13_0: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe dhammā anattā’ti.
sn22.90:6.8_0: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sabbe dhammā anattā’ti.
sn22.90:6.9_0: Atha ca pana me sabbasaṅkhārasamathe sabbūpadhipaṭinissagge taṇhākkhaye virāge nirodhe nibbāne cittaṁ
sn22.90:6.9_1: na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
sn22.90:6.13_0: Na kho panevaṁ dhammaṁ passato hoti.
sn22.90:6.14_0: Ko nu kho me tathā dhammaṁ deseyya yathāhaṁ dhammaṁ passeyyanti.
sn22.90:7.2_0: ‘ayaṁ kho āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ,
sn22.90:7.2_1: pahoti ca me āyasmā ānando tathā dhammaṁ desetuṁ yathāhaṁ dhammaṁ passeyyaṁ.
sn22.90:7.3_0: Atthi ca me āyasmante ānande tāvatikā vissaṭṭhi.
sn22.90:7.7_0: karotu me, āyasmā ānando dhammiṁ kathaṁ yathāhaṁ dhammaṁ passeyyan”ti.
sn22.90:8.1_0: “Ettakenapi mayaṁ āyasmato channassa attamanā api nāma taṁ āyasmā channo āvi akāsi khīlaṁ chindi.
sn22.90:8.4_0: Atha kho āyasmato channassa tāvatakeneva uḷāraṁ pītipāmojjaṁ uppajji:
sn22.90:9.2_0: dvayanissito khvāyaṁ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena atthitañceva natthitañca.
sn22.90:9.3_0: Lokasamudayaṁ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā, sā na hoti.
sn22.90:9.4_0: Lokanirodhaṁ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato yā loke atthitā, sā na hoti.
sn22.90:9.6_0: taṁ cāyaṁ upayupādānaṁ cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayaṁ na upeti na upādiyati nādhiṭṭhāti ‘attā me’ti.
sn22.90:9.7_0: Dukkhameva uppajjamānaṁ uppajjati, dukkhaṁ nirujjhamānaṁ nirujjhatīti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati.
sn22.90:9.12_0: Ete te, kaccāna, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti—
sn22.90:10.1_2: hoti yesaṁ āyasmantānaṁ tādisā sabrahmacārayo anukampakā atthakāmā ovādakā anusāsakā.
sn22.90:10.2_0: Idañca pana me āyasmato ānandassa dhammadesanaṁ sutvā dhammo abhisamito”ti.
sn22.91:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā rāhulo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.91:1.2_2: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rāhulo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.91:1.3_1: jānato kathaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti?
sn22.91:2.1_1: rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.91:2.1_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
sn22.91:2.5_0: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā …pe…
sn22.91:2.6_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
sn22.91:2.7_1: jānato evaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti.
sn22.92:1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rāhulo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.92:1.3_1: jānato kathaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānāpagataṁ
sn22.92:2.1_1: rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā …pe…
sn22.92:2.1_5: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā anupādā vimutto hoti.
sn22.92:2.5_0: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.92:2.5_3: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā anupādā vimutto hoti.
sn22.92:2.6_1: jānato evaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānāpagataṁ
sn22.93:1.2_3: Tassā ubhosu tīresu kāsā cepi jātā assu,
sn22.93:1.2_13: Tassā puriso sotena vuyhamāno kāse cepi gaṇheyya,
sn22.93:1.3_2: assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto,
sn22.93:1.3_3: sappurisānaṁ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
sn22.93:1.4_0: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.93:1.10_0: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.94:1.2_0: “Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, lokena vivadāmi, lokova mayā vivadati.
sn22.94:1.3_0: Na, bhikkhave, dhammavādī kenaci lokasmiṁ vivadati.
sn22.94:1.4_0: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, natthisammataṁ loke paṇḍitānaṁ, ahampi taṁ ‘natthī’ti vadāmi.
sn22.94:1.5_0: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, atthisammataṁ loke paṇḍitānaṁ, ahampi taṁ ‘atthī’ti vadāmi.
sn22.94:2.1_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, natthisammataṁ loke paṇḍitānaṁ, yamahaṁ ‘natthī’ti vadāmi?
sn22.94:2.2_2: niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ natthisammataṁ loke paṇḍitānaṁ;
sn22.94:2.6_0: viññāṇaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ natthisammataṁ loke paṇḍitānaṁ;
sn22.94:2.7_0: Idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, natthisammataṁ loke paṇḍitānaṁ; ahampi taṁ ‘natthī’ti vadāmi.
sn22.94:3.1_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, atthisammataṁ loke paṇḍitānaṁ, yamahaṁ ‘atthī’ti vadāmi?
sn22.94:3.2_2: aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ atthisammataṁ loke paṇḍitānaṁ;
sn22.94:3.4_0: viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ atthisammataṁ loke paṇḍitānaṁ;
sn22.94:3.5_0: Idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, atthisammataṁ loke paṇḍitānaṁ; ahampi taṁ ‘atthī’ti vadāmi.
sn22.94:4.1_0: Atthi, bhikkhave, loke lokadhammo, taṁ tathāgato abhisambujjhati abhisameti;
sn22.94:4.2_0: abhisambujjhitvā abhisametvā taṁ ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti.
sn22.94:5.1_4: abhisambujjhitvā abhisametvā ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti?
sn22.94:5.2_0: Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, loke lokadhammo taṁ tathāgato abhisambujjhati abhisameti.
sn22.94:5.3_0: Abhisambujjhitvā abhisametvā ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti.
sn22.94:6.1_2: tathāgatena evaṁ ācikkhiyamāne desiyamāne paññapiyamāne paṭṭhapiyamāne vivariyamāne vibhajiyamāne uttānīkariyamāne na jānāti na passati tamahaṁ,
sn22.94:6.1_4: bālaṁ puthujjanaṁ andhaṁ acakkhukaṁ ajānantaṁ apassantaṁ kinti karomi.
sn22.94:6.5_0: viññāṇaṁ, bhikkhave, loke lokadhammo taṁ tathāgato abhisambujjhati abhisameti.
sn22.94:6.6_0: Abhisambujjhitvā abhisametvā ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti.
sn22.94:7.1_2: tathāgatena evaṁ ācikkhiyamāne desiyamāne paññapiyamāne paṭṭhapiyamāne vivariyamāne vibhajiyamāne uttānīkariyamāne na jānāti na passati tamahaṁ,
sn22.94:7.1_4: bālaṁ puthujjanaṁ andhaṁ acakkhukaṁ ajānantaṁ apassantaṁ kinti karomi.
sn22.94:8.1_2: uppalaṁ vā padumaṁ vā puṇḍarīkaṁ vā udake jātaṁ udake saṁvaḍḍhaṁ udakā accuggamma ṭhāti anupalittaṁ udakena;
sn22.94:8.2_2: tathāgato loke jāto loke saṁvaḍḍho lokaṁ abhibhuyya viharati anupalitto lokenā”ti.
sn22.95:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā ayujjhāyaṁ viharati gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre.
sn22.95:2.1_2: ayaṁ gaṅgā nadī mahantaṁ pheṇapiṇḍaṁ āvaheyya.
sn22.95:2.1_3: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso passeyya nijjhāyeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya.
sn22.95:2.1_4: Tassa taṁ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyeyya,
sn22.95:2.2_3: yaṁ dūre santike vā taṁ bhikkhu passati nijjhāyati yoniso upaparikkhati.
sn22.95:2.2_4: Tassa taṁ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyati,
sn22.95:3.1_2: saradasamaye thullaphusitake deve vassante udake udakapubbuḷaṁ uppajjati ceva nirujjhati ca.
sn22.95:3.1_3: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso passeyya nijjhāyeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya.
sn22.95:3.1_4: Tassa taṁ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyeyya,
sn22.95:3.2_3: yā dūre santike vā taṁ bhikkhu passati nijjhāyati yoniso upaparikkhati.
sn22.95:3.2_4: Tassa taṁ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyati,
sn22.95:4.1_2: gimhānaṁ pacchime māse ṭhite majjhanhike kāle marīcikā phandati.
sn22.95:4.1_3: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso passeyya nijjhāyeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya.
sn22.95:4.1_4: Tassa taṁ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyeyya,
sn22.95:4.2_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yā kāci saññā …pe….
sn22.95:5.1_2: puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno tiṇhaṁ kuṭhāriṁ ādāya vanaṁ paviseyya.
sn22.95:5.1_3: So tattha passeyya mahantaṁ kadalikkhandhaṁ ujuṁ navaṁ akukkukajātaṁ.
sn22.95:5.1_7: So tassa pattavaṭṭiṁ vinibbhujanto pheggumpi nādhigaccheyya,
sn22.95:5.1_9: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso passeyya nijjhāyeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya.
sn22.95:5.1_10: Tassa taṁ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyeyya,
sn22.95:5.2_3: ye dūre santike vā taṁ bhikkhu passati nijjhāyati yoniso upaparikkhati.
sn22.95:5.2_4: Tassa taṁ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyati,
sn22.95:6.1_2: māyākāro vā māyākārantevāsī vā catumahāpathe māyaṁ vidaṁseyya.
sn22.95:6.1_3: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso passeyya nijjhāyeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya.
sn22.95:6.1_4: Tassa taṁ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyeyya,
sn22.95:6.2_4: taṁ bhikkhu passati nijjhāyati yoniso upaparikkhati.
sn22.95:6.2_5: Tassa taṁ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyati,
sn22.95:7.2_0: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti …pe…
sn22.95:8.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn22.96:1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.96:1.3_1: kiñci rūpaṁ yaṁ rūpaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati?
sn22.96:1.4_1: kāci vedanā yā vedanā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati?
sn22.96:1.5_0: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kāci saññā yā saññā …pe…
sn22.96:1.6_1: keci saṅkhārā ye saṅkhārā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassanti?
sn22.96:1.7_2: yaṁ viññāṇaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassatī”ti?
sn22.96:1.8_2: yaṁ rūpaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati.
sn22.96:1.12_1: yaṁ viññāṇaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassatī”ti.
sn22.96:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṁ gomayapiṇḍaṁ pāṇinā gahetvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
sn22.96:2.2_1: attabhāvapaṭilābho natthi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati.
sn22.96:2.3_1: attabhāvapaṭilābho abhavissa nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo,
sn22.96:2.4_1: ettakopi attabhāvapaṭilābho natthi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo,
sn22.96:3.1_0: Bhūtapubbāhaṁ, bhikkhu, rājā ahosiṁ khattiyo muddhāvasitto.
sn22.96:3.2_1: rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītinagarasahassāni ahesuṁ kusāvatīrājadhānippamukhāni.
sn22.96:3.3_1: rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītipāsādasahassāni ahesuṁ dhammapāsādappamukhāni.
sn22.96:3.4_1: rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītikūṭāgārasahassāni ahesuṁ mahābyūhakūṭāgārappamukhāni.
sn22.96:3.5_1: rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītipallaṅkasahassāni ahesuṁ dantamayāni sāramayāni sovaṇṇamayāni
sn22.96:3.5_2: goṇakatthatāni paṭikatthatāni paṭalikatthatāni kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇāni sauttaracchadāni ubhatolohitakūpadhānāni.
sn22.96:3.6_1: rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītināgasahassāni ahesuṁ sovaṇṇālaṅkārāni sovaṇṇaddhajāni
sn22.96:3.7_1: rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītiassasahassāni ahesuṁ sovaṇṇālaṅkārāni sovaṇṇaddhajāni
sn22.96:3.8_1: rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītirathasahassāni ahesuṁ sovaṇṇālaṅkārāni sovaṇṇaddhajāni
sn22.96:3.9_1: rañño sato khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa caturāsītimaṇisahassāni ahesuṁ maṇiratanappamukhāni.
sn22.96:3.10_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu …pe… caturāsītiitthisahassāni ahesuṁ subhaddādevippamukhāni.
sn22.96:3.11_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu …pe… caturāsītikhattiyasahassāni ahesuṁ anuyantāni pariṇāyakaratanappamukhāni.
sn22.96:3.12_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhu …pe… caturāsītidhenusahassāni ahesuṁ dukūlasandānāni kaṁsūpadhāraṇāni.
sn22.96:3.13_2: caturāsītivatthakoṭisahassāni ahesuṁ khomasukhumāni koseyyasukhumāni kambalasukhumāni kappāsikasukhumāni.
sn22.96:4.1_1: caturāsītiyā nagarasahassānaṁ ekaññeva taṁ nagaraṁ hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena ajjhāvasāmi—kusāvatī rājadhānī.
sn22.96:4.2_1: caturāsītiyā pāsādasahassānaṁ ekoyeva so pāsādo hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena ajjhāvasāmi—dhammo pāsādo.
sn22.96:4.3_1: caturāsītiyā kūṭāgārasahassānaṁ ekaññeva taṁ kūṭāgāraṁ hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena ajjhāvasāmi—mahābyūhaṁ kūṭāgāraṁ.
sn22.96:4.4_1: caturāsītiyā pallaṅkasahassānaṁ ekoyeva so pallaṅko hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena paribhuñjāmi—dantamayo vā sāramayo vā sovaṇṇamayo vā rūpiyamayo vā.
sn22.96:4.5_1: caturāsītiyā nāgasahassānaṁ ekoyeva so nāgo hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena abhiruhāmi—uposatho nāgarājā.
sn22.96:4.6_1: caturāsītiyā assasahassānaṁ ekoyeva so asso hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena abhiruhāmi—valāhako assarājā.
sn22.96:4.7_1: caturāsītiyā rathasahassānaṁ ekoyeva so ratho hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena abhiruhāmi—vejayanto ratho.
sn22.96:4.8_1: caturāsītiyā itthisahassānaṁ ekāyeva sā itthī hoti yā maṁ tena samayena paccupaṭṭhāti—khattiyānī vā velāmikā vā.
sn22.96:4.9_1: caturāsītiyā vatthakoṭisahassānaṁ ekaññeva taṁ vatthayugaṁ hoti yamahaṁ tena samayena paridahāmi—khomasukhumaṁ
sn22.96:4.9_2: vā koseyyasukhumaṁ vā kambalasukhumaṁ vā kappāsikasukhumaṁ vā.
sn22.96:4.10_1: caturāsītiyā thālipākasahassānaṁ ekoyeva so thālipāko hoti yato nāḷikodanaparamaṁ bhuñjāmi tadupiyañca sūpeyyaṁ.
sn22.96:4.11_0: Iti kho, bhikkhu, sabbe te saṅkhārā atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā.
sn22.96:4.15_0: Yāvañcidaṁ, bhikkhu, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṁ, alaṁ virajjituṁ, alaṁ vimuccitun”ti.
sn22.97:1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.97:1.3_1: kiñci rūpaṁ yaṁ rūpaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati?
sn22.97:1.4_1: kāci vedanā yā vedanā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati?
sn22.97:1.5_0: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kāci saññā …pe…
sn22.97:1.6_0: keci saṅkhārā, ye saṅkhārā niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassanti?
sn22.97:1.7_2: yaṁ viññāṇaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassatī”ti?
sn22.97:1.8_2: yaṁ rūpaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati.
sn22.97:1.12_1: yaṁ viññāṇaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassatī”ti.
sn22.97:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṁ nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsuṁ āropetvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
sn22.97:2.2_1: rūpaṁ natthi niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati.
sn22.97:2.3_1: rūpaṁ abhavissa niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ,
sn22.97:2.4_1: ettakampi rūpaṁ natthi niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ,
sn22.97:3.1_1: vedanā natthi niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati.
sn22.97:3.2_1: vedanā abhavissa niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā,
sn22.97:3.2_2: na yidaṁ brahmacariyavāso paññāyetha sammā dukkhakkhayāya.
sn22.97:3.3_1: ettakāpi vedanā natthi niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā,
sn22.97:4.2_1: saṅkhārā natthi niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassanti.
sn22.97:4.3_1: saṅkhārā abhavissaṁsu niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā,
sn22.97:4.3_2: na yidaṁ brahmacariyavāso paññāyetha sammā dukkhakkhayāya.
sn22.97:4.4_1: ettakāpi saṅkhārā natthi niccā dhuvā sassatā avipariṇāmadhammā,
sn22.97:5.1_1: viññāṇaṁ natthi niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati.
sn22.97:5.2_1: viññāṇaṁ abhavissa niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ,
sn22.97:5.2_2: na yidaṁ brahmacariyavāso paññāyetha sammā dukkhakkhayāya.
sn22.97:5.3_1: ettakampi viññāṇaṁ natthi niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ,
sn22.98:1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.98:1.3_2: yaṁ rūpaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati?
sn22.98:1.4_0: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kāci vedanā …pe…
sn22.98:1.7_1: yaṁ viññāṇaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassatī”ti?
sn22.98:1.8_1: kiñci rūpaṁ yaṁ rūpaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati.
sn22.98:1.12_1: yaṁ viññāṇaṁ niccaṁ dhuvaṁ sassataṁ avipariṇāmadhammaṁ sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassatī”ti.
sn22.99:1.3_0: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
sn22.99:1.4_0: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ mahāsamuddo ussussati visussati na bhavati;
sn22.99:1.5_2: avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ dukkhassa antakiriyaṁ vadāmi.
sn22.99:1.6_0: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ sineru pabbatarājā ḍayhati vinassati na bhavati;
sn22.99:1.7_2: avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ dukkhassa antakiriyaṁ vadāmi.
sn22.99:1.8_0: Hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ mahāpathavī ḍayhati vinassati na bhavati;
sn22.99:1.9_2: avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ dukkhassa antakiriyaṁ vadāmi.
sn22.99:2.1_2: sā gaddulabaddho daḷhe khīle vā thambhe vā upanibaddho tameva khīlaṁ vā thambhaṁ vā anuparidhāvati anuparivattati;
sn22.99:2.2_0: evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī …pe…
sn22.99:2.7_0: viññāṇaṁ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.99:2.9_9: na parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi.
sn22.99:3.1_0: Sutavā ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī …pe… sappurisadhamme suvinīto,
sn22.99:3.7_0: So rūpaṁ nānuparidhāvati nānuparivattati, vedanaṁ … saññaṁ …
sn22.99:3.8_0: So rūpaṁ ananuparidhāvaṁ ananuparivattaṁ, vedanaṁ … saññaṁ …
sn22.99:3.8_8: parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi.
sn22.100:1.3_0: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
sn22.100:1.4_2: sā gaddulabaddho daḷhe khīle vā thambhe vā upanibaddho.
sn22.100:1.4_3: So gacchati cepi tameva khīlaṁ vā thambhaṁ vā upagacchati;
sn22.100:1.4_4: tiṭṭhati cepi tameva khīlaṁ vā thambhaṁ vā upatiṭṭhati;
sn22.100:1.4_5: nisīdati cepi tameva khīlaṁ vā thambhaṁ vā upanisīdati;
sn22.100:1.4_6: nipajjati cepi tameva khīlaṁ vā thambhaṁ vā upanipajjati.
sn22.100:1.9_0: viññāṇaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.100:1.10_0: So gacchati cepi ime pañcupādānakkhandhe upagacchati;
sn22.100:1.14_0: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, abhikkhaṇaṁ sakaṁ cittaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ:
sn22.100:2.1_0: Diṭṭhaṁ vo, bhikkhave, caraṇaṁ nāma cittan”ti?
sn22.100:2.4_0: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, abhikkhaṇaṁ sakaṁ cittaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ:
sn22.100:3.1_2: aññaṁ ekanikāyampi samanupassāmi evaṁ cittaṁ yathayidaṁ,
sn22.100:3.3_0: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, abhikkhaṇaṁ sakaṁ cittaṁ paccavekkhitabbaṁ:
sn22.100:4.1_2: rajako vā cittakārako vā rajanāya vā lākhāya vā haliddiyā vā nīliyā vā mañjiṭṭhāya vā suparimaṭṭhe phalake
sn22.100:4.1_3: vā bhittiyā vā dussapaṭṭe vā itthirūpaṁ vā purisarūpaṁ vā abhinimmineyya sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṁ;
sn22.101:1.2_0: “Jānato ahaṁ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṁ khayaṁ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
sn22.101:1.3_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti?
sn22.101:1.4_0: ‘Iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
sn22.101:1.8_0: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti—
sn22.101:1.9_0: evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn22.101:2.1_0: Bhāvanānuyogaṁ ananuyuttassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viharato kiñcāpi evaṁ icchā uppajjeyya:
sn22.101:2.2_0: ‘aho vata me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimucceyyā’ti,
sn22.101:2.2_1: atha khvassa neva anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccati.
sn22.101:3.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vā.
sn22.101:3.2_0: Tānassu kukkuṭiyā na sammā adhisayitāni, na sammā pariseditāni, na sammā paribhāvitāni.
sn22.101:3.3_0: Kiñcāpi tassā kukkuṭiyā evaṁ icchā uppajjeyya:
sn22.101:3.4_0: ‘aho vata me kukkuṭapotakā pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṁ padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjeyyun’ti,
sn22.101:3.5_0: atha kho abhabbāva te kukkuṭapotakā pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṁ padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjituṁ.
sn22.101:3.7_0: Tathā hi pana, bhikkhave, kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vā;
sn22.101:3.8_0: tāni kukkuṭiyā na sammā adhisayitāni, na sammā pariseditāni, na sammā paribhāvitāni.
sn22.101:3.9_2: bhāvanānuyogaṁ ananuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato kiñcāpi evaṁ icchā uppajjeyya:
sn22.101:3.10_0: ‘aho vata me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimucceyyā’ti,
sn22.101:3.10_1: atha khvassa neva anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccati.
sn22.101:4.1_0: Bhāvanānuyogaṁ anuyuttassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viharato kiñcāpi na evaṁ icchā uppajjeyya:
sn22.101:4.2_0: ‘aho vata me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimucceyyā’ti,
sn22.101:4.2_1: atha khvassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccati.
sn22.101:5.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vā.
sn22.101:5.2_0: Tānassu kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitāni, sammā pariseditāni, sammā paribhāvitāni.
sn22.101:5.3_0: Kiñcāpi tassā kukkuṭiyā na evaṁ icchā uppajjeyya:
sn22.101:5.4_0: ‘aho vata me kukkuṭapotakā pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṁ padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjeyyun’ti,
sn22.101:5.5_0: atha kho bhabbāva te kukkuṭapotakā pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṁ padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjituṁ.
sn22.101:5.7_0: Tathā hi pana, bhikkhave, kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vā;
sn22.101:5.8_0: tānassu kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitāni, sammā pariseditāni, sammā paribhāvitāni.
sn22.101:5.9_2: bhāvanānuyogaṁ anuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato kiñcāpi na evaṁ icchā uppajjeyya:
sn22.101:5.10_0: ‘aho vata me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimucceyyā’ti,
sn22.101:5.10_1: atha khvassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccati.
sn22.101:5.14_0: Bhāvitattā catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ …pe… bhāvitattā ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa.
sn22.101:6.1_2: palagaṇḍassa vā palagaṇḍantevāsissa vā vāsijaṭe dissanteva aṅgulipadāni dissati aṅguṭṭhapadaṁ.
sn22.101:6.2_0: No ca khvassa evaṁ ñāṇaṁ hoti:
sn22.101:6.3_0: ‘ettakaṁ vata me ajja vāsijaṭassa khīṇaṁ, ettakaṁ hiyyo, ettakaṁ pare’ti.
sn22.101:6.4_0: Atha khvassa khīṇe khīṇantveva ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.101:6.5_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhāvanānuyogaṁ anuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato kiñcāpi na evaṁ ñāṇaṁ hoti:
sn22.101:6.6_3: atha khvassa khīṇe khīṇantveva ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.101:6.7_2: sāmuddikāya nāvāya vettabandhanabaddhāya vassamāsāni udake pariyādāya hemantikena thalaṁ ukkhittāya vātātapaparetāni vettabandhanāni.
sn22.101:6.7_3: Tāni pāvusakena meghena abhippavuṭṭhāni appakasireneva paṭippassambhanti pūtikāni bhavanti;
sn22.101:6.8_2: bhāvanānuyogaṁ anuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato appakasireneva saṁyojanāni paṭippassambhanti pūtikāni bhavantī”ti.
sn22.102:2.1_2: saradasamaye kassako mahānaṅgalena kasanto sabbāni mūlasantānakāni sampadālento kasati;
sn22.102:2.2_2: aniccasaññā bhāvitā bahulīkatā sabbaṁ kāmarāgaṁ pariyādiyati,
sn22.102:3.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pabbajalāyako pabbajaṁ lāyitvā agge gahetvā odhunāti niddhunāti nicchoṭeti;
sn22.102:3.2_2: aniccasaññā bhāvitā bahulīkatā sabbaṁ kāmarāgaṁ pariyādiyati …pe…
sn22.102:4.1_2: ambapiṇḍiyā vaṇṭacchinnāya yāni tattha ambāni vaṇṭapaṭibandhāni sabbāni tāni tadanvayāni bhavanti;
sn22.102:4.2_0: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasaññā bhāvitā …pe… sabbaṁ asmimānaṁ samūhanati.
sn22.102:5.1_2: kūṭāgārassa yā kāci gopānasiyo sabbā tā kūṭaṅgamā kūṭaninnā kūṭasamosaraṇā,
sn22.102:5.2_0: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasaññā bhāvitā …pe… sabbaṁ asmimānaṁ samūhanati.
sn22.102:6.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci mūlagandhā kāḷānusārigandho tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati;
sn22.102:6.2_0: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasaññā …pe… sabbaṁ asmimānaṁ samūhanati.
sn22.102:7.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci sāragandhā, lohitacandanaṁ tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati;
sn22.102:7.2_0: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasaññā …pe… sabbaṁ asmimānaṁ samūhanati.
sn22.102:8.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci pupphagandhā, vassikaṁ tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati;
sn22.102:8.2_0: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasaññā …pe… sabbaṁ asmimānaṁ samūhanati.
sn22.102:9.2_0: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasaññā …pe… sabbaṁ asmimānaṁ samūhanati.
sn22.102:10.1_3: sabbā tā candimappabhāya kalaṁ nāgghanti soḷasiṁ,
sn22.102:10.2_0: evameva kho, bhikkhave, aniccasaññā …pe… sabbaṁ asmimānaṁ samūhanati.
sn22.102:11.1_2: saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalāhake deve ādicco nataṁ abbhussakkamāno,
sn22.102:11.1_3: sabbaṁ ākāsagataṁ tamagataṁ abhivihacca bhāsate ca tapate ca virocate ca;
sn22.102:11.2_2: aniccasaññā bhāvitā bahulīkatā sabbaṁ kāmarāgaṁ pariyādiyati,
sn22.102:12.1_2: aniccasaññā kathaṁ bahulīkatā sabbaṁ kāmarāgaṁ pariyādiyati …pe…
sn22.102:12.2_0: ‘Iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
sn22.102:12.6_0: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti—
sn22.102:12.7_2: aniccasaññā evaṁ bahulīkatā sabbaṁ kāmarāgaṁ pariyādiyati,
sn22.103:2.2_0: Yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandirāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṁ—
sn22.103:3.2_0: Yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo—
sn22.104:1.13_0: Yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo—
sn22.106:1.2_0: “Pariññeyye ca, bhikkhave, dhamme desessāmi pariññañca pariññātāviñca puggalaṁ.
sn22.107:1.5_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti …pe…
sn22.107:1.6_0: pajānanti, sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
sn22.108:1.5_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti …pe…
sn22.108:1.6_0: pajānanti, sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
sn22.109:1.5_2: ariyasāvako imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.109:1.6_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
sn22.110:1.5_2: bhikkhu imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ viditvā anupādāvimutto hoti.
sn22.110:1.6_2: bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto”ti.
sn22.111:1.2_0: “Rūpe, bhikkhave, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṁ pajahatha.
sn22.111:1.3_0: Evaṁ taṁ rūpaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ.
sn22.111:1.7_0: viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṁ pajahatha.
sn22.111:1.8_0: Evaṁ taṁ viññāṇaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhamman”ti.
sn22.112:1.2_2: yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā,
sn22.112:1.3_0: Evaṁ taṁ rūpaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ …pe…
sn22.112:1.7_0: evaṁ te saṅkhārā pahīnā bhavissanti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
sn22.112:1.8_0: Viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā,
sn22.112:1.9_0: Evaṁ taṁ viññāṇaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhamman”ti.
sn22.113:1.2_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn22.113:1.3_0: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.114:1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.115:1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.115:1.4_0: kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhammakathiko hotī”ti?
sn22.115:1.5_1: nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṁ deseti ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhū’ti alaṁvacanāya.
sn22.116:1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.116:1.4_0: kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhammakathiko hoti;
sn22.116:1.5_0: kittāvatā dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti, kittāvatā diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto hotī”ti?
sn22.117:1.2_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṁ adassāvī …pe… sappurisadhamme avinīto
sn22.117:1.3_0: rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; attani vā rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.117:1.4_2: assutavā puthujjano rūpabandhanabaddho santarabāhirabandhanabaddho atīradassī apāradassī,
sn22.117:1.4_3: baddho jīyati baddho mīyati baddho asmā lokā paraṁ lokaṁ gacchati.
sn22.117:1.5_0: Vedanaṁ attato samanupassati …pe… vedanāya vā attānaṁ.
sn22.117:1.6_2: assutavā puthujjano vedanābandhanabaddho santarabāhirabandhanabaddho atīradassī apāradassī,
sn22.117:1.6_3: baddho jīyati baddho mīyati baddho asmā lokā paraṁ lokaṁ gacchati.
sn22.117:1.10_2: assutavā puthujjano viññāṇabandhanabaddho santarabāhirabandhanabaddho atīradassī apāradassī,
sn22.117:1.10_3: baddho jīyati baddho mīyati baddho asmā lokā paraṁ lokaṁ gacchati.
sn22.117:2.1_0: Sutavā ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako ariyānaṁ dassāvī …pe… sappurisadhamme suvinīto
sn22.117:2.2_0: na rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṁ vā attānaṁ; na attani vā rūpaṁ, na rūpasmiṁ vā attānaṁ.
sn22.118:1.3_0: rūpaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassathā”ti?
sn22.118:1.6_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.118:1.10_0: viññāṇaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassathā”ti?
sn22.118:1.13_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ …pe…
sn22.119:1.3_0: rūpaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassathā”ti?
sn22.119:1.6_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn22.119:1.10_0: viññāṇaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassathā”ti?
sn22.119:1.13_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ …
sn22.120:1.4_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, saṁyojaniyā dhammā, katamaṁ saṁyojanaṁ?
sn22.120:1.6_0: yo tattha chandarāgo, taṁ tattha saṁyojanaṁ.
sn22.120:1.11_0: yo tattha chandarāgo, taṁ tattha saṁyojanaṁ.
sn22.120:1.12_0: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, saṁyojaniyā dhammā, idaṁ saṁyojanan”ti.
sn22.121:1.4_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, upādāniyā dhammā, katamaṁ upādānaṁ?
sn22.121:1.6_0: yo tattha chandarāgo, taṁ tattha upādānaṁ.
sn22.121:1.11_0: yo tattha chandarāgo, taṁ tattha upādānaṁ.
sn22.121:1.12_0: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, upādāniyā dhammā, idaṁ upādānan”ti.
sn22.122:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṁ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn22.122:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn22.122:1.3_0: “sīlavatāvuso, sāriputta, bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasikātabbā”ti?
sn22.122:1.4_1: bhikkhunā pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato anattato yoniso manasi kātabbā.
sn22.122:1.7_1: bhikkhunā ime pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato anattato yoniso manasi kātabbā.
sn22.122:1.8_1: vijjati yaṁ sīlavā bhikkhu ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato …pe…
sn22.122:1.8_2: anattato yoniso manasi karonto sotāpattiphalaṁ sacchikareyyā”ti.
sn22.122:2.1_0: “Sotāpannena panāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
sn22.122:2.3_1: vijjati yaṁ sotāpanno bhikkhu ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato …pe…
sn22.122:2.3_2: anattato yoniso manasi karonto sakadāgāmiphalaṁ sacchikareyyā”ti.
sn22.122:3.1_0: “Sakadāgāminā panāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
sn22.122:3.3_1: vijjati yaṁ sakadāgāmī bhikkhu ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato …pe…
sn22.122:3.3_2: anattato yoniso manasi karonto anāgāmiphalaṁ sacchikareyyā”ti.
sn22.122:4.1_0: “Anāgāminā panāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
sn22.122:4.3_1: vijjati yaṁ anāgāmī bhikkhu ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato …pe…
sn22.122:4.3_2: anattato yoniso manasi karonto arahattaṁ sacchikareyyā”ti.
sn22.122:5.1_0: “Arahatā panāvuso sāriputta, katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
sn22.122:5.2_2: ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato anattato yoniso manasi kātabbā.
sn22.122:5.3_0: Natthi, khvāvuso, arahato uttari karaṇīyaṁ katassa vā paticayo;
sn22.122:5.4_0: api ca ime dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya ceva saṁvattanti satisampajaññāya cā”ti.
sn22.123:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṁ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn22.123:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.123:2.1_0: “Sutavatāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
sn22.123:2.2_0: “Sutavatāvuso koṭṭhika, bhikkhunā pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato …pe… anattato yoniso manasi kātabbā.
sn22.123:2.6_1: vijjati—yaṁ sutavā bhikkhu ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato …pe…
sn22.123:2.6_2: anattato yoniso manasi karonto sotāpattiphalaṁ sacchikareyyā”ti.
sn22.123:3.1_0: “Sotāpannena panāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
sn22.123:3.3_1: vijjati—yaṁ sotāpanno bhikkhu ime pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccato …pe…
sn22.123:4.1_0: “Arahatā panāvuso sāriputta, katame dhammā yoniso manasi kātabbā”ti?
sn22.123:4.2_1: ime pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato anattato yoniso manasi kātabbā.
sn22.123:4.3_0: Natthi, khvāvuso, arahato uttari karaṇīyaṁ, katassa vā paticayo;
sn22.123:4.4_0: api ca kho ime dhammā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya ceva saṁvattanti satisampajaññāya cā”ti.
sn22.124:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā kappo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn22.124:1.2_1: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā kappo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.124:1.3_1: jānato kathaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti?
sn22.124:2.1_1: rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.124:2.1_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
sn22.124:2.5_0: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.124:2.5_3: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
sn22.124:2.6_1: jānato evaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti.
sn22.125:1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā kappo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.125:1.3_1: jānato kathaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānāpagataṁ
sn22.125:1.3_2: mānasaṁ hoti vidhā samatikkantaṁ santaṁ suvimuttan”ti?
sn22.125:2.1_4: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā anupādāvimutto hoti.
sn22.125:2.5_0: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn22.125:2.5_3: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā anupādāvimutto hoti.
sn22.125:2.6_1: jānato evaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānāpagataṁ
sn22.125:2.6_2: mānasaṁ hoti vidhā samatikkantaṁ santaṁ suvimuttan”ti.
sn22.126:1.2_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.126:1.2_2: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.126:2.1_1: assutavā puthujjano samudayadhammaṁ rūpaṁ ‘samudayadhammaṁ rūpan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti;
sn22.126:3.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.126:4.1_1: sutavā ariyasāvako samudayadhammaṁ rūpaṁ ‘samudayadhammaṁ rūpan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti;
sn22.127:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṁ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn22.127:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito …pe…
sn22.127:1.2_1: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.127:2.1_0: “Idhāvuso assutavā puthujjano samudayadhammaṁ rūpaṁ ‘samudayadhammaṁ rūpan’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti;
sn22.128:1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṁ viharanti isipatane migadāye …pe…
sn22.128:1.2_0: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.128:2.1_1: sutavā ariyasāvako samudayadhammaṁ rūpaṁ ‘samudayadhammaṁ rūpan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti;
sn22.129:1.2_0: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.129:2.1_0: “Idhāvuso assutavā puthujjano rūpassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
sn22.129:2.5_0: viññāṇassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
sn22.130:2.1_0: “Idhāvuso, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.130:2.5_0: viññāṇassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.131:2.1_1: assutavā puthujjano rūpassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
sn22.131:2.5_0: viññāṇassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
sn22.132:1.2_0: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.132:2.1_1: sutavā ariyasāvako rūpassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.132:2.5_0: viññāṇassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.133:1.3_0: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ mahākoṭṭhikaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.133:2.1_0: “Idhāvuso, assutavā puthujjano rūpassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
sn22.133:2.5_0: viññāṇassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
sn22.133:3.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ mahākoṭṭhikaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.133:4.1_0: “Idhāvuso, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.133:4.5_0: viññāṇassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.134:2.1_1: assutavā puthujjano rūpassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
sn22.134:2.5_0: viññāṇassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
sn22.134:3.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ mahākoṭṭhikaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.134:4.1_1: sutavā ariyasāvako rūpassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.134:4.5_0: viññāṇassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
sn22.135:1.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ mahākoṭṭhikaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.135:3.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ mahākoṭṭhikaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.136:1.2_0: “Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, kukkuḷaṁ, vedanā kukkuḷā, saññā kukkuḷā, saṅkhārā kukkuḷā, viññāṇaṁ kukkuḷaṁ.
sn22.136:1.4_0: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn22.136:1.5_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn22.137:1.2_0: “Yaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ; tatra vo chando pahātabbo.
sn22.137:1.4_0: Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ; tatra vo chando pahātabbo.
sn22.137:1.8_0: viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ; tatra vo chando pahātabbo.
sn22.137:1.9_0: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ; tatra vo chando pahātabbo”ti.
sn22.138:1.2_0: “Yaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ; tatra vo rāgo pahātabbo.
sn22.138:1.4_0: Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ; tatra vo rāgo pahātabbo.
sn22.138:1.8_0: viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ; tatra vo rāgo pahātabbo.
sn22.138:1.9_0: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ; tatra vo rāgo pahātabbo”ti.
sn22.139:1.2_0: “Yaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ; tatra vo chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn22.139:1.4_0: Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ, tatra vo chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn22.139:1.8_0: viññāṇaṁ aniccaṁ; tatra vo chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn22.139:1.9_0: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, aniccaṁ; tatra vo chandarāgo pahātabbo”ti.
sn22.140:1.2_0: “Yaṁ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ; tatra vo chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn22.140:1.3_0: yaṁ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ; tatra vo chando pahātabbo”ti.
sn22.141:1.2_0: “Yaṁ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ; tatra vo rāgo pahātabbo …pe…
sn22.141:1.3_0: yaṁ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ; tatra vo rāgo pahātabbo”ti.
sn22.142:1.2_0: “Yaṁ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ; tatra vo chandarāgo pahātabbo …pe…
sn22.142:1.3_0: yaṁ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ; tatra vo chandarāgo pahātabbo”ti.
sn22.143:1.2_0: “Yo, bhikkhave, anattā; tatra vo chando pahātabbo.
sn22.143:1.4_0: Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, anattā; tatra vo chando pahātabbo.
sn22.143:1.8_0: viññāṇaṁ anattā; tatra vo chando pahātabbo.
sn22.143:1.9_0: Yo, bhikkhave, anattā; tatra vo chando pahātabbo”ti.
sn22.144:1.2_0: “Yo, bhikkhave, anattā; tatra vo rāgo pahātabbo.
sn22.144:1.4_0: Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, anattā; tatra vo rāgo pahātabbo.
sn22.144:1.8_0: viññāṇaṁ anattā; tatra vo rāgo pahātabbo.
sn22.144:1.9_0: Yo, bhikkhave, anattā; tatra vo rāgo pahātabbo”ti.
sn22.145:1.2_0: “Yo, bhikkhave, anattā; tatra vo chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn22.145:1.4_0: Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, anattā; tatra vo chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn22.145:1.8_0: viññāṇaṁ anattā; tatra vo chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn22.145:1.9_0: Yo, bhikkhave, anattā; tatra vo chandarāgo pahātabbo”ti.
sn22.146:1.4_3: viññāṇe nibbidābahulo viharanto rūpaṁ parijānāti, vedanaṁ … saññaṁ …
sn22.146:1.5_0: so rūpaṁ parijānaṁ vedanaṁ parijānaṁ saññaṁ parijānaṁ saṅkhāre parijānaṁ viññāṇaṁ parijānaṁ parimuccati rūpamhā,
sn22.146:1.5_5: parimuccati jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi;
sn22.149:1.11_0: viññāṇe anattānupassī viharanto rūpaṁ parijānāti, vedanaṁ …pe…
sn22.149:1.15_0: So rūpaṁ parijānaṁ vedanaṁ parijānaṁ saññaṁ parijānaṁ saṅkhāre parijānaṁ viññāṇaṁ parijānaṁ parimuccati rūpamhā,
sn22.149:1.15_5: parimuccati jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi;
sn22.150:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhan”ti?
sn22.150:1.4_0: “rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati rūpaṁ upādāya uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ.
sn22.150:1.8_0: viññāṇe sati viññāṇaṁ upādāya uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ.
sn22.150:1.12_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.150:1.14_1: api nu taṁ anupādāya uppajjeyya ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhan”ti?
sn22.150:1.21_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.150:1.23_1: api nu taṁ anupādāya uppajjeyya ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhan”ti?
sn22.151:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa:
sn22.151:1.3_0: ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassatī”ti?
sn22.151:1.5_0: “rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa …pe…
sn22.151:1.6_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa:
sn22.151:1.7_0: ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.151:1.11_0: vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti samanupasseyyāti?
sn22.151:1.18_0: vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti samanupasseyyāti?
sn22.152:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn22.152:1.3_0: ‘so attā, so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’”ti?
sn22.152:1.5_0: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn22.152:1.6_0: ‘so attā, so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti.
sn22.152:1.10_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn22.152:1.11_0: ‘so attā, so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’ti.
sn22.152:2.4_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.152:2.6_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn22.152:2.7_0: ‘so attā, so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’”ti?
sn22.152:2.14_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn22.152:2.16_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn22.152:2.17_0: ‘so attā so loko, so pecca bhavissāmi nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo’”ti?
sn22.153:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn22.153:1.3_0: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?

sn22.153:1.6_0: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.

sn22.153:1.11_0: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.

sn22.153:1.18_0: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?

sn22.153:1.27_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn22.153:1.28_0: ‘no cassaṁ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn22.154:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa micchādiṭṭhi uppajjatī”ti?
sn22.154:1.4_0: “rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa micchādiṭṭhi uppajjati.
sn22.154:1.8_0: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa micchādiṭṭhi uppajjati.
sn22.154:1.13_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya micchādiṭṭhi uppajjeyyā”ti?

sn22.155:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa sakkāyadiṭṭhi uppajjatī”ti?

sn22.155:1.13_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya sakkāyadiṭṭhi uppajjeyyā”ti?
sn22.155:1.21_0: api nu taṁ anupādāya sakkāyadiṭṭhi uppajjeyyā”ti?
sn22.156:1.2_0: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa attānudiṭṭhi uppajjatī”ti?

sn22.159:1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā …pe… bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
